tika-vin10t1:8: Sasikkho sādiyanto so, ṭhapetvā kiriyaṁ cuto.
tika-vin10t1:59: Nimittaṁ itthiyā tassa, chupato garukaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:85: Apade ahayo macchā, kapotā dvipadepi ca;
tika-vin10t1:130: Tatthajātakakaṭṭhaṁ vā, lataṁ vā chindato pana;
tika-vin10t1:133: Pathaviṁ khaṇato vāpi, byūhato paṁsumeva vā;
tika-vin10t1:134: Āmasantassa vā kumbhiṁ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:142: Uddharantassa khāṇuṁ vā, chindato saṅkhalimpi vā;
tika-vin10t1:143: Thullaccayaṁ tato kumbhiṁ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:145: Paṭhamaṁ pana kumbhiṁ vā, uddharitvā tathā puna;
tika-vin10t1:146: Ṭhānā cāveti khāṇuṁ vā, saṅkhaliṁ vāpi so nayo.
tika-vin10t1:148: Ito cito ca ghaṁsanto, mūle sāreti rakkhati;
tika-vin10t1:151: Jātaṁ chindati ce rukkhaṁ, dukkaṭaṁ kumbhimatthake;
tika-vin10t1:157: Haranto kumbhiyā bhaṇḍaṁ, muṭṭhiṁ chindati attano;
tika-vin10t1:158: Bhājane vā gataṁ katvā, hoti bhikkhu parājito.
tika-vin10t1:160: Hāraṁ vā pana pāmaṅgaṁ, suttāruḷhaṁ tu kumbhiyā;
tika-vin10t1:161: Phandāpeti yathāvatthuṁ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:167: Sakalampi ca taṁ kumbhiṁ, pivato na parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:169: Sace khipati yaṁ kiñci, bhaṇḍakaṁ telakumbhiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:170: Taṁ pādagghanakaṁ telaṁ, dhuvaṁ pivati tāvade.
tika-vin10t1:173: Āviñjetvāpi vā kumbhiṁ, telaṁ gāḷeti ce tathā.
tika-vin10t1:176: Pītaṁ telañca taṁ bhaṇḍaṁ, uddharantova dhaṁsito.
tika-vin10t1:178: Tattheva bhindato telaṁ, chaḍḍentassa tatheva ca;
tika-vin10t1:179: Jhāpentassa abhogaṁ vā, karontassa ca dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:190: Dvīsu passesu pakkhanto, heṭṭhā pādanakhā tathā.
tika-vin10t1:196: Hatthaṁ vāpi pasāreti, purato vāssa tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin10t1:198: Moropi gagane pakkhe, cāreti na ca gacchati;
tika-vin10t1:204: Aggahetvā gahetvā vā, hatthena pana attano;
tika-vin10t1:205: Ṭhānā cāveti ce moraṁ, sayaṁ ṭhānā cuto siyā.
tika-vin10t1:208: Kalāpaggena vā phuṭṭhaṁ, mukhatuṇḍena bhikkhu ce.
tika-vin10t1:210: Atikkāmeyya yo moraṁ, ṭhānā cāveti nāma so;
tika-vin10t1:213: Gagane pana gacchanto, kare moro nilīyati;
tika-vin10t1:216: Sace gaṇhāti taṁ moraṁ, itarena karena so;
tika-vin10t1:217: Cāvitattā pana ṭhānā, bhikkhu ṭhānā cuto siyā.
tika-vin10t1:219: Itaraṁ pana morassa, upaneti sace karaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:220: Na doso tattha uḍḍetvā, sayameva nilīyati.
tika-vin10t1:222: Disvā aṅge nilīnaṁ taṁ, theyyacittena gacchato;
tika-vin10t1:223: Pāde thullaccayaṁ hoti, dutiye ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:231: Chijjamānaṁ suvaṇṇādiṁ, patte patati ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:237: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, hatthe vattheva matthake;
tika-vin10t1:238: Taṁ taṁ tassa bhave ṭhānaṁ, yattha yattha patiṭṭhitaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:244: Saṁharitvā sace vaṁse, ṭhapitaṁ hoti cīvaraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:245: Katvā punorato bhogaṁ, tathā antañca pārato.
tika-vin10t1:248: Na tu cīvaravaṁso so, hotīti sakalo mato.
tika-vin10t1:251: Itarenapi vā phuṭṭhaṁ, orimantena vā puna.
tika-vin10t1:256: Uddhaṁ vā ukkhipantassa, cīvaraṁ pana vaṁsato;
tika-vin10t1:259: Rajjukena ca bandhitvā, ṭhapitaṁ pana cīvaraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:266: Saṁharitvā tu nikkhitte, cīvare viya nicchayo.
tika-vin10t1:268: Sikkāya pakkhipitvā yaṁ, laggitaṁ hoti bhaṇḍakaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:269: Sikkāto taṁ haranto vā, saha sikkāya vā cuto.
tika-vin10t1:272: Agge vā pana bunde vā, gahetvā parikaḍḍhato.
tika-vin10t1:281: Bhittiṁ pana ca nissāya, ṭhapitepi ayaṁ nayo.
tika-vin10t1:283: Cālentassa ca tālassa, phalaṁ vatthu hi pūrati;
tika-vin10t1:284: Yenassa bandhanā mutte, tasmiṁ pārājikaṁ bhave.
tika-vin10t1:286: Piṇḍiṁ chindati tālassa, sace pārājikaṁ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:294: Vatthu taṁ chindato pupphaṁ, tassa pārājikaṁ vade.
tika-vin10t1:297: Na chijjati tato yāva, tāva naṁ parirakkhati.
tika-vin10t1:303: Ākārena sace tāni, ṭhānā cāveti nassati.
tika-vin10t1:306: Cāletvā udakaṁ puppha-ṭṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:311: Accuggatassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ, jalato sakalaṁ jalaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:317: Pupphe gahetvā nāmetvā, uppāṭeti sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:318: Na tassa udakaṁ ṭhānaṁ, naṭṭho uppāṭitakkhaṇe.
tika-vin10t1:320: Yo hi sassāmike macche, theyyacittena gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t1:323: Tassevaṁ gaṇhato vatthu, yena macchena pūrati;
tika-vin10t1:329: Nīrato uppatitvā yo, tīre patati vārijo;
tika-vin10t1:333: Ninne macchavisaṁ nāma, pakkhipitvā gate pana.
tika-vin10t1:335: Pacchā macchavisaṁ macchā, khāditvā pilavanti ce;
tika-vin10t1:341: Gahetvā sāmikā macche, sace yanti nirālayā;
tika-vin10t1:342: Gaṇhato pana te sese, theyyacittena dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:345: Eseva ca nayo sese, kacchapādimhi vārije.
tika-vin10t1:357: Purato pacchato vāpi, passato vāpi kaḍḍhato.
tika-vin10t1:365: Bandhitvā pana yā tīre, ṭhapitā niccale jale;
tika-vin10t1:366: Bandhanañca ṭhitokāso, ṭhānaṁ tassā dvidhā mataṁ.
tika-vin10t1:369: Pacchā kenacupāyena, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:372: Eseva ca nayo vutto, theyyacittassa bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:385: Theyyā titthe ṭhitaṁ nāvaṁ, āruhitvā sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:391: Āgamma balavā vāto, nāvaṁ harati ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:392: Vāteneva haṭā nāvā, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:395: Acāventova taṁ ṭhānā, kiṇitvā ce palāyati.
tika-vin10t1:398: Sayameva ca gacchantiṁ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:401: Yānaṁ nāma ratho vayhaṁ, sakaṭaṁ sandamānikā;
tika-vin10t1:408: Yānaṁ pājayato tassa, nisīditvā dhure pana.
tika-vin10t1:419: Purato pacchato vāpi, ṭhānā cāveti ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:420: Thullaccayaṁ tu tiṇṇampi, ṭhānā cāve parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:429: Uddhīsu vā gahetvā taṁ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:431: Ṭhapitassa hi cakkassa, nābhiyā pana bhūmiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:434: Phusitvā yaṁ ṭhitaṁ bhūmiṁ, nemipassena nābhiyā;
tika-vin10t1:444: Ito cito ca ghaṁsanto, theyyacittena yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:447: Khandhaṁ oropite bhāre, tassa pārājikaṁ mataṁ;
tika-vin10t1:458: Parājeti paraṁ dhammaṁ, caranto ce parājito.522
tika-vin10t1:461: Parajjati sayaṁ dhammaṁ, caranto yopi tassa ca.
tika-vin10t1:472: Asitena ca lāyitvā, chinditvā vā karena ca.
tika-vin10t1:474: Yasmiṁ bījepi vā vatthu, sīse pūreti muṭṭhiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:475: Bandhanā mocite tasmiṁ, tassa pārājikaṁ bhave.
tika-vin10t1:477: Acchinno pana daṇḍo vā, taco vā appamattako;
tika-vin10t1:489: Tañca kho sāmikānaṁ tu, dhuranikkhepane sati;
tika-vin10t1:492: Gahetabbā sace hoti, dvīhi khīlehi yā pana;
tika-vin10t1:496: Rajjuṁ vāpi pasāreti, yaṭṭhiṁ pāteti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:498: Yehi dvīhi payogehi, attano santakaṁ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:499: Ādo thullaccayaṁ tesu, dutiye ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:503: Gāmaṭṭhepi ca vattabbaṁ, apubbaṁ natthi kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t1:506: Tiṇaṁ vā pana paṇṇaṁ vā, lataṁ vā kaṭṭhameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:510: Tacchetvā ṭhapito rukkho, gahetabbo na kocipi.
tika-vin10t1:515: Lakkhaṇe challiyonaddhe, na doso koci gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t1:519: Citte cintento vā aññaṁ, bhaṇḍadeyyaṁ hotevassa.
tika-vin10t1:537: Āviñjitvā pavesetvā, chiddaṁ katvāpi vā tathā.
tika-vin10t1:539: Vāpiyaṁ vā taḷāke vā, bhājanaṁ attano pana;
tika-vin10t1:545: Anto ṭhatvā bahi ṭhatvā, chindanto ubhayatthapi;
tika-vin10t1:552: Chinditvā yāva saṅghassa, na niyyādenti te pana;
tika-vin10t1:553: Ābhataṁ tāva taṁ sabbaṁ, tesameva ca santakaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:555: Tasmā taṁ theyyacittena, gaṇhantassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:558: Yadā niyyāditaṁ tehi, tato paṭṭhāya saṅghikaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:562: Sabbasādhāraṇattā ca, aññaṁ viya na hotidaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:565: Aggiṁ vā deti satthena, ākoṭeti samantato;
tika-vin10t1:568: Yena vā tena vā rukkho, vinassati ca ḍayhati;
tika-vin10t1:572: Sīsato kaṇṇato vāpi, gīvato hatthatopi vā;
tika-vin10t1:584: Nivatthaṁ pana vatthaṁ yo, acchindati parassa ce;
tika-vin10t1:585: Paropi pana lajjāya, sahasā taṁ na muñcati.
tika-vin10t1:587: Ākaḍḍhati ca coropi, so paro tāva rakkhati;
tika-vin10t1:596: Athāpi parikappetvā, pātāpeti va yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:599: Phandāpeti yathāvatthuṁ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto;
tika-vin10t1:600: ‘‘Tiṭṭha tiṭṭhā’’ti vadato, na doso chaḍḍitepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:602: Āgantvā theyyacittena, pacchā taṁ gaṇhato siyā;
tika-vin10t1:608: ‘‘Tiṭṭha tiṭṭhā’’ti vutto ca, chaḍḍetvā pana bhaṇḍakaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:621: ‘‘Raho mayā panetassa, ṭhapitaṁ kiṁ nu dassati’’;
tika-vin10t1:624: Tasmiṁ dāne nirussāhe, paro ce nikkhipe dhuraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:631: Suṅkaghātassa antova, ṭhatvā pāteti ce bahi;
tika-vin10t1:632: Dhuvaṁ patati ce hatthā, muttamatte parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:634: Taṁ rukkhe khāṇuke vāpi, hutvā paṭihataṁ puna;
tika-vin10t1:635: Vātukkhittampi vā anto, sace patati rakkhati.
tika-vin10t1:637: Patitvā bhūmiyaṁ pacchā, vaṭṭantaṁ pana bhaṇḍakaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:640: Ṭhatvā ṭhatvā pavaṭṭantaṁ, paviṭṭhaṁ ce parājayo;
tika-vin10t1:644: Sārato taṁ gahetabbaṁ, yuttaṁ viya ca dissati.
tika-vin10t1:646: Sayaṁ vā yadi vaṭṭeti, vaṭṭāpeti parena vā;
tika-vin10t1:647: Aṭṭhatvā vaṭṭamānaṁ taṁ, gataṁ nāsakaraṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:649: Ṭhatvā ṭhatvā sace anto, bahi gacchati rakkhati;
tika-vin10t1:652: Gacchante pana yāne vā, gaje vā taṁ ṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t1:655: Ṭhapite ṭhitayāne vā, payogena vinā gate;
tika-vin10t1:658: Sace pājeti taṁ yānaṁ, ṭhapetvā yānake maṇiṁ;
tika-vin10t1:661: Suṅkaṭṭhāne mataṁ suṅkaṁ, gantuṁ datvāva vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:665: Antojātaṁ dhanakkītaṁ, dinnaṁ vā pana kenaci;
tika-vin10t1:668: Bhujissaṁ vā harantassa, mānusaṁ mātarāpi vā;
tika-vin10t1:683: Saṇikaṁ pana gacchantaṁ, sace vadati sopi ca;
tika-vin10t1:684: Sīghaṁ gacchati ce tassa, vacanena parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:686: Palāyitvā sace aññaṁ, gāmaṁ vā nigamampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:687: Gataṁ disvā tato tañce, palāpeti parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:700: So nikkhamati ce sappo, tassa pārājikaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:702: Tathā katvā tu maṇḍūka-mūsikānaṁ ravampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:706: Yena kenaci nikkhante, sappe pārājikaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:716: Ṭhānaṁ sālā ca vatthu ca, aṅgaṇaṁ sakalaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:719: Tasmā tesaṁ vasā hatthiṁ, harato kāraye budho.
tika-vin10t1:721: Nagarassa bahiddhā tu, ṭhitassa pana hatthino;
tika-vin10t1:724: Nipannassa gajassekaṁ, ṭhānaṁ taṁ uṭṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t1:725: Tasmiṁ uṭṭhitamatte tu, tassa pārājikaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:732: Garukaṁ theyyacittena, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:748: Nikkhipeyyassa satthaṁ vā, vadeyya maraṇe guṇaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:751: Asandheyyova so ñeyyo, dvedhā bhinnasilā viya.
tika-vin10t1:756: Tattha kāyena vā kāya-paṭibaddhena vā sayaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:757: Mārentassa paraṁ ghāto, ayaṁ sāhatthiko mato.
tika-vin10t1:759: ‘‘Evaṁ tvaṁ paharitvā taṁ, mārehī’’ti ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:769: Ayaṁ vijjāmayo nāma, payogo pañcamo mato.
tika-vin10t1:771: Samatthā māraṇe yā ca, iddhi kammavipākajā;
tika-vin10t1:777: Bahusvapi yamuddissa, pahāraṁ deti ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:778: Maraṇena ca tasseva, kammunā tena bajjhati.
tika-vin10t1:783: Mate pahaṭamatte vā, pacchā mubhayathāpi ca;
tika-vin10t1:786: Evaṁ sāhatthiko ñeyyo, tathā āṇattikopi ca;
tika-vin10t1:787: Ettāvatā samāsena, dve payogā hi dassitā.
tika-vin10t1:789: Vatthu kālo ca deso ca, satthañca iriyāpatho;
tika-vin10t1:792: Māretabbo hi yo tattha, so ‘‘vatthū’’ti pavuccati;
tika-vin10t1:793: Pubbaṇhādi siyā kālo, sattānaṁ yobbanādi ca.
tika-vin10t1:795: Deso gāmādi viññeyyo, satthaṁ taṁ sattamāraṇaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:801: ‘‘Yaṁ mārehī’’ti āṇatto, aññaṁ māreti ce tato;
tika-vin10t1:810: Āṇatto ‘‘ajja pubbaṇhe, mārehī’’ti ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:811: So ce māreti sāyanhe, mūlaṭṭho parimuccati.
tika-vin10t1:819: Yadā kadāci pubbaṇhe, visaṅketo na mārite.
tika-vin10t1:824: ‘‘Imaṁ gāme ṭhitaṁ veriṁ, mārehī’’ti ca bhāsito;
tika-vin10t1:825: Sace so pana māreti, ṭhitaṁ taṁ yattha katthaci.
tika-vin10t1:827: Natthi tassa visaṅketo, ubho bajjhanti kammunā;
tika-vin10t1:830: ‘‘Vaneyevā’’ti vā vutto, gāme māreti cepi vā;
tika-vin10t1:837: Yena kenaci satthena, visaṅketo na mārite.
tika-vin10t1:842: Iti vutto sace veriṁ, dhārāya itarāya vā;
tika-vin10t1:849: Māreti naṁ nisinnaṁ ce, visaṅketo na vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:852: Vutto māreti gacchantaṁ, nisinnaṁ vā yathākkamaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:855: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, sabbiriyāpathesu ca.
tika-vin10t1:857: ‘‘Mārehī’’ti ca vijjhitvā, āṇatto hi parena so;
tika-vin10t1:860: ‘‘Mārehī’’ti ca vijjhitvā, āṇatto hi parena so;
tika-vin10t1:861: Chinditvā yadi māreti, visaṅketova hoti so.
tika-vin10t1:866: Dīghaṁ rassaṁ kisaṁ thūlaṁ, kāḷaṁ odātameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:869: Sopi yaṁ kiñci āṇatto, sace māreti tādisaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:873: Khaṇantassa ca opātaṁ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:876: Patitvā ca mate tasmiṁ, tassa pārājikaṁ bhave.
tika-vin10t1:878: Nipatitvā panaññasmiṁ, mate doso na vijjati;
tika-vin10t1:881: ‘‘Patitvā ettha yo koci, maratū’’ti hi yattakā;
tika-vin10t1:882: Maranti nipatitvā ce, dosā hontissa tattakā.
tika-vin10t1:887: Patitvā gabbhinī tasmiṁ, sagabbhā ce marissati;
tika-vin10t1:893: Verino tattha pātetvā, sace mārenti verino;
tika-vin10t1:894: Patitaṁ tattha mārenti, nīharitvā sace bahi.
tika-vin10t1:896: Nibbattitvā hi opāte, matā ce opapātikā;
tika-vin10t1:897: Asakkontā ca nikkhantuṁ, sabbattha ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:905: Tathā yakkhādayo pāṇe, khate uddissa bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:909: Pāsaṁ oḍḍeti yo tattha, sace bajjhanti pāṇino.
tika-vin10t1:914: Uddissa hi kate pāse, yaṁ panuddissa oḍḍito;
tika-vin10t1:917: Mūlena vā mudhā vāpi, dinne pāse parassa hi;
tika-vin10t1:920: Yena laddho sace lopi, pāsamuggaḷitampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:923: Yo pāsaṁ uggaḷāpetvā, yāti pāpabhayā sace;
tika-vin10t1:924: Taṁ disvā puna aññopi, saṇṭhapeti hi tattha ca.
tika-vin10t1:926: Baddhā baddhā maranti ce, mūlaṭṭho na ca muccati;
tika-vin10t1:929: Gopetvāpi na mokkho hi, pāsayaṭṭhiṁ sayaṁkataṁ;
tika-vin10t1:930: Tamañño puna gaṇhitvā, saṇṭhapeti sace pana.
tika-vin10t1:932: Tappaccayā marantesu, mūlaṭṭho na ca muccati;
tika-vin10t1:933: Nāsetvā sabbaso vā taṁ, jhāpetvā vā vimuccati.
tika-vin10t1:935: Ropentassa ca sūlaṁ vā, sajjentassa adūhalaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:960: Jānāti ce hoti cuto hi no ce;
tika-vin10t1:978: Paṭhame dutiye cante, pariyāyo na vijjati;
tika-vin10t1:982: Sesā ca tisamuṭṭhānā, tesamaṅgāni satta tu.
tika-vin10t1:996: Mudupiṭṭhi ca lambī ca, mukhaggāhī nisīdako;
tika-vin10t1:1027: Sukkaṁ yadi vimoceti, garukaṁ tassa niddise.
tika-vin10t1:1030: Thullaccayaṁ samuddiṭṭhaṁ, sace sukkaṁ na muccati.
tika-vin10t1:1033: Hoti thullaccayaṁ tassa, yadi sukkaṁ na muccati.
tika-vin10t1:1035: Vatthiṁ kīḷāya pūretvā, passāvetuṁ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:1057: Ekena pana hatthena, gahetvā dutiyena vā;
tika-vin10t1:1063: Aṅgulīnaṁ tu pañcannaṁ, gahaṇe ekato pana;
tika-vin10t1:1064: Ekāyeva siyāpatti, na hi koṭṭhāsato siyā.
tika-vin10t1:1094: Vādāpetuñca vādetuṁ, vāditaṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1097: Pūjā buddhassa kātabbā, vattabbāti ca viññunā.
tika-vin10t1:1119: Gaṇanāya ca vācānaṁ, itthīnaṁ garukā siyuṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1121: Sā ce nappaṭijānāti, tassa thullaccayaṁ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:1141: Tasmiṁyeva khaṇe sā ce, jānāti garukaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:1143: No ce jānāti sā yakkhi-petidevīsu paṇḍake;
tika-vin10t1:1144: Hoti thullaccayaṁ tassa, sese āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1150: Obhāso tena rāgena, khaṇe tasmiṁ vijānanaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1157: Vīmaṁsati garu hoti, paccāharati ce pana.
tika-vin10t1:1172: Ekeneva ca sabbattha, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1174: Cetiyassa ca saṅghassa, gilānassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:1200: Sace ekavipannā sā, garukaṁ ekakaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:1206: Hatthakammampi nāmetaṁ, kiñci vatthu na hoti hi.
tika-vin10t1:1211: ‘‘Goṇaṁ demā’’ti vuttepi, gahetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:1220: Paccayesu hi tīsveva, viññatti na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:1226: Pharasuṁ vāpi vāsiṁ vā, nisentassāpi dukkaṭaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1227: Chindato dukkaṭaṁ rukkhaṁ, tassa pācittiyā saha.
tika-vin10t1:1232: Yā pana dvīhi piṇḍehi, niṭṭhānaṁ tu gamissati;
tika-vin10t1:1233: Hoti thullaccayaṁ tesu, paṭhame dutiye garu.
tika-vin10t1:1236: Tathā bhūmiṁ samaṁ katvā, bhindatopi ca taṁ kuṭiṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1241: Desāpetvāva bhikkhūhi, vatthuṁ pana ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:1248: Adesetvā sace vatthuṁ, yo kareyya mahallakaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1262: Suddhaṁ vā yadi vāsuddhaṁ, tesu aññatarena yo.
tika-vin10t1:1276: Taṁ ce paro vijānāti, hoti āpatti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:1281: Atha sopi ‘‘mayā diṭṭhaṁ, sutaṁ vā’’ti ca bhāsati;
tika-vin10t1:1282: Tesaṁ dvinnampi saṅghādi-seso hoti na saṁsayo.
tika-vin10t1:1284: Dūtaṁ vā pana pesetvā, paṇṇaṁ vā pana sāsanaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1294: Tathā kammaṁ karontassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1309: Codeti vā tathāsaññī, codāpeti parena vā;
tika-vin10t1:1313: Samaggassa ca saṅghassa, bhedatthaṁ vāyameyya yo;
tika-vin10t1:1316: So hi bhikkhūhi vattabbo, ‘‘bhedatthaṁ mā parakkama’’;
tika-vin10t1:1319: Vuccamāno hi teheva, nissajjeyya na ceva yaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1323: Disvā sutvā hi ñatvā vā, avadantassa dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1326: Dūrampi pana gantabbaṁ, sace sakkoti tāvade.
tika-vin10t1:1329: Dūtaṁ vā pana paṇṇaṁ vā, pesatopi ca dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1332: Kammavācāhi ca dvīhi, hoti thullaccayaṁ dvayaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1340: Ñattito pana pubbe vā, pacchā vā taṅkhaṇepi vā;
tika-vin10t1:1347: Yasmiñca nibbematiko, taṁ sabbaṁ tassa vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1377: Kamme kariyamāne taṁ, accajaṁ garukaṁ phuse.
tika-vin10t1:1379: Cuṇṇaṁ paṇṇaṁ phalaṁ pupphaṁ, veḷuṁ kaṭṭhañca mattikaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1391: Haritvā vā harāpetvā, pitūnaṁ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:1394: Tañca kho vatthupūjatthaṁ, dātabbaṁ na panaññathā;
tika-vin10t1:1406: Gilānānaṁ manussānaṁ, dātabbaṁ tu sakaṁ phalaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1409: Saṅghārāme yathā yatra, saṅghena katikā katā;
tika-vin10t1:1422: Tathā ropāpane vuttaṁ, ubhayattha ca bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:1424: Sakiṁ āṇattiyā tassa, bahūnaṁ ropane pana;
tika-vin10t1:1425: Sadukkaṭā tu pācitti, suddhaṁ vā dukkaṭaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:1428: Ropane paribhogatthaṁ, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:1430: Kappiyabhūmi ce hoti, sayaṁ ropetumeva ca;
tika-vin10t1:1434: Vaṭṭateva ca bhikkhūnaṁ, taṁ phalaṁ paribhuñjituṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1436: Siñcane pana sabbattha, sayaṁ siñcāpanepi ca;
tika-vin10t1:1443: Siñcane dukkaṭaṁ vuttaṁ, tathā siñcāpanepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:1451: Ganthimaṁ gopphimaṁ nāma, vedhimaṁ veṭhimampi ca;
tika-vin10t1:1454: Tattha daṇḍena daṇḍaṁ vā, vaṇṭenapi ca vaṇṭakaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1463: Veṭhimaṁ nāma veṭhetvā, kataṁ mālāguṇehi vā;
tika-vin10t1:1472: Sabbametaṁ sayaṁ kātuṁ, kārāpetuṁ parehi vā;
tika-vin10t1:1476: Aññehi pūritaṁ puppha-paṭaṁ vā vāyitumpi ca.
tika-vin10t1:1479: Kharapattamayaṁ mālaṁ, sabbaṁ kātuṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1485: Pupphesuyeva vā pupphaṁ, pavesetuṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1488: Pavesentassa pupphāni, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:1497: Atha kho vejjakammādi, na kattabbaṁ kudācanaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1505: Jeṭṭhabhātā kaniṭṭho ca, tathā bhaginiyo duve;
tika-vin10t1:1508: Pitucchā mātulo cāti, dasime ñātayo matā;
tika-vin10t1:1511: Sace bhesajjametesaṁ, nappahoti na hoti vā;
tika-vin10t1:1512: Yācantipi ca taṁ bhikkhuṁ, dātabbaṁ tāvakālikaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1514: Sace te na ca yācanti, dātabbaṁ tāvakālikaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1515: Ābhogaṁ pana katvā vā, ‘‘dassanti puna me ime’’.
tika-vin10t1:1517: Etesaṁ tu kulā yāva, sattamā kuladūsanaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1521: Sace te ñātakā honti, kātuṁ tesampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1523: Aññātakā sace honti, bhātuno anujāya vā;
tika-vin10t1:1526: Atha tesampi puttānaṁ, katvā dātabbameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:1538: Jalaṁ hatthena cāletvā, madditvā pana suttakaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1540: Dātabbaṁ bhikkhunā katvā, tesameva ca santakaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1541: Attano udakaṁ tesaṁ, suttaṁ vā deti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1550: Ṭhapetvā taṁ panaññassa, pitunopi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1553: Satthunā dukkaṭaṁ vuttaṁ, karontassa pade pade.
tika-vin10t1:1559: Pañcannaṁ sahadhammīnaṁ, na ca vaṭṭati bhuñjituṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1594: Kammavācā hi kātabbā, dātabbo tassa tena ca.
tika-vin10t1:1600: Chedaṁ vā vattabhedaṁ vā, akatvāva sadā vase.
tika-vin10t1:1602: Parivāso visodhetuṁ, na sakkā tattha ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:1603: Nikkhipitvāna taṁ vattaṁ, vatthabbaṁ tena bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:1605: Tattheva saṅghamajjhe vā, puggale vāpi nikkhipe;
tika-vin10t1:1606: Nikkhipāmīti vattaṁ vā, parivāsanti vā tathā.
tika-vin10t1:1618: Gumbena vatiyā vāpi, channaṭṭhāne ṭhitena tu.
tika-vin10t1:1623: Nikkhipitvā tato vattaṁ, gantabbaṁ tu yathāsukhaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1624: Antoyevāruṇe bhikkhu, gato ce yassa kassaci.
tika-vin10t1:1626: Ārocetvāva taṁ vattaṁ, nikkhipe puna paṇḍito;
tika-vin10t1:1636: Ekaccaṁ sakalaṁ vāpi, dātabbo vimatissa vā.
tika-vin10t1:1650: Tathā sambahulāsvekā, dve vā sambahulāpi vā;
tika-vin10t1:1651: Yā yā cirapaṭicchannā, tāsaṁ agghavasena hi.
tika-vin10t1:1657: Sabbātā ekato katvā, dātabbo missako mato.
tika-vin10t1:1662: Tattha yā apaṭicchannā, hoti āpatti yassa tu;
tika-vin10t1:1674: Nikkhipe santike tesaṁ, vattaṁ tesu gatesu vā;
tika-vin10t1:1686: Chādetvā vāpi āpattiṁ, acchādetvāpi vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:1699: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti sabbattha dukkaṭaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1706: Na karoti anāpattiṁ, itthīnaṁ tu satampi ca.
tika-vin10t1:1718: Anandhābadhiro viññū, itthī vā purisopi vā;
tika-vin10t1:1721: Andho abadhiro vāpi, badhiro vāpi cakkhumā;
tika-vin10t1:1728: Cīvaraṁ chabbidhaṁ vuttaṁ, jātito pana kappiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1736: Ekāhampi vinā bhikkhu, na vaseyya ticīvaraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1739: Rajitvā kappiyaṁ binduṁ, datvā tattha ticīvaraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1743: Muṭṭhittikā ca tiriyaṁ, uttamantena sā pana.
tika-vin10t1:1759: Tīṇipi dvepi cekaṁ vā, chinditabbaṁ pahoti ce;
tika-vin10t1:1763: Bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṁ vuttaṁ, dubbhogena ca sevato.
tika-vin10t1:1780: Eko tantupi acchinno, adhiṭṭhānaṁ na bhindati;
tika-vin10t1:1783: Paṭhamaṁ aggaḷaṁ datvā, pacchā chindati rakkhati;
tika-vin10t1:1784: Ghaṭetvā koṭiyo dve vā, pacchā chindati rakkhati.
tika-vin10t1:1813: Gaṇanaṁ vā pamāṇaṁ vā, na parikkhāracoḷake;
tika-vin10t1:1826: Puna paccuddharitvā taṁ, vikappeyya tato paraṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1828: Tāva kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṁ, yāva rogo na sammati;
tika-vin10t1:1859: Vuttattā ca nisedhetuṁ, na sakkā vinayaññunā.
tika-vin10t1:1868: Dukkaṭaṁ tiriṭe vāpi, veṭhane kañcukepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:1886: Bhikkhuno pana tenassa, vippavatthuṁ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:1890: Aruṇe uṭṭhite kiṁ nu, kātabbaṁ tena bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:1893: Tabbhayā pana so bhikkhu, naggo gacchati dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1896: Na tassākappiyaṁ nāma, cīvaraṁ atthi kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t1:1898: Nigāsetvā gahetvā ca, gantvā bhikkhussa santikaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1902: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti pārupanādisu.
tika-vin10t1:1907: There ca dahare maggaṁ, gacchantesu ubhosupi;
tika-vin10t1:1911: Hoti nissaggiyaṁ vatthaṁ, na passambhati nissayo.
tika-vin10t1:1914: Hoti nissaggiyaṁ vatthaṁ, passambhati ca nissayo.
tika-vin10t1:1917: Hoti nissaggiyaṁ vatthaṁ, passambhati ca nissayo.
tika-vin10t1:1927: Paccāsāya tato uddhaṁ, ṭhapetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1935: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā bhuttaṁ, vatthaṁ aññātikāya yo;
tika-vin10t1:1939: Tathā sesehi ca dvīhi, dīpitaṁ dukkaṭadvayaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1941: Sikkhamānāya vā hatthe, dhovanatthāya deti ce;
tika-vin10t1:1942: Sā hutvā upasampannā, pacchā dhovati so nayo.
tika-vin10t1:1951: Parivatte tu liṅgasmiṁ, sace dhovati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1953: ‘‘Dhovā’’ti bhikkhunī vuttā, sace sabbaṁ karoti sā;
tika-vin10t1:1963: Tāya dhovāpane vāpi, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1965: Avuttā paribhuttaṁ vā, aññaṁ vā yadi dhovati;
tika-vin10t1:1984: Aññaṁ pana parikkhāraṁ, na doso hoti gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t1:1995: Aññassatthāya vā tassa, ñātake vā pavārite.
tika-vin10t1:2004: Yassa tīṇipi naṭṭhāni, dve vā ekampi vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:2005: Dve vā ekampi vā tena, sāditabbaṁ na kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t1:2015: Cīvare pana yo tassa, lābhā nissaggiyaṁ bhave.
tika-vin10t1:2029: Akappiyaṁ suvaṇṇādiṁ, gahetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2031: Rajataṁ jātarūpaṁ vā, attano vā parassa vā;
tika-vin10t1:2032: Atthāya gaṇhituṁ kiñci, dīyamānaṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2037: Netvā akappiyaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ, itthaṁ koci sace vade;
tika-vin10t1:2040: Ārāmaṁ vā vihāraṁ vā, cetiyaṁ vā karohi’’ti;
tika-vin10t1:2041: Na ca vaṭṭati taṁ vatthuṁ, sabbesaṁ sampaṭicchituṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2043: Anāmasitvā saṅghaṁ vā, gaṇaṁ vā puggalampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:2046: Taṁ hiraññaṁ suvaṇṇaṁ vā, nisedhetuṁ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2053: Gahaṇaṁ paribhogo vā, na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:2056: Iccevaṁ pana vatvā ce, deti sabbampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2058: Kārāpeti ca kedāre, chindāpetvā vanaṁ pana;
tika-vin10t1:2062: Bhāgaṁ dethā’’ti vatvā ce, uṭṭhāpeti kahāpaṇe.
tika-vin10t1:2071: Rajjuyā vāpi daṇḍena, khettaṁ mināti yo pana.
tika-vin10t1:2073: Khale vā rakkhati ṭhatvā, khalatopi tato puna;
tika-vin10t1:2080: Āharanti ca yaṁ vuttā, sabbesaṁ tamakappiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2085: ‘‘Gāvo demā’’ti vuttepi, gahetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2089: Kappiyena ca vākyena, sabbaṁ vaṭṭati gaṇhituṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2091: Hatthiṁ vā mahisaṁ assaṁ, goṇaṁ kukkuṭasūkaraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2092: Dentesu ca manussesu, na ca vaṭṭati gaṇhituṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2094: Paṭisiddhepi saṅghassa, datvā gacchati ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:2095: Mūlaṁ datvā ca saṅghassa, keci gaṇhanti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2101: Yadi codetiyeva cha, codanā diguṇā ṭhiti.
tika-vin10t1:2112: Aññena ca kataṁ laddhā, sevamānassa dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2122: Anāpatti tulaṁ vāpi, bahuṁ vā sabbameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:2129: Imesaṁ pana tiṇṇampi, tatiyaṁ tu kriyākriyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2132: Channaṁ orena vassānaṁ, karontassa ca santhataṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2136: Kataṁ vā pana aññena, labhitvā paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t1:2152: Gacchante pana yāne vā, hatthiassādikesu vā;
tika-vin10t1:2158: Yāne pana agacchante, asse vā hatthipiṭṭhiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2167: Suttakena ca bandhitvā, ṭhapitaṁ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2171: Yo caññavihito vāpi, āpatti yadi gacchati.
tika-vin10t1:2176: Nivāsatthāya vā gantvā, harantassa tato paraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2177: Acchinnaṁ vāpi nissaṭṭhaṁ, labhitvā haratopi ca.
tika-vin10t1:2196: Muttā maṇi silā saṅkho, pavāḷaṁ lohitaṅkako;
tika-vin10t1:2203: Suttaṁ vatthaṁ halaṁ phālaṁ, kappiyaṁ evamādikaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2206: Sampaṭicchati yo bhikkhu, tassa nissaggiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2209: Dukkaṭassa ca vatthumpi, sabbatthāya ca dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2217: ‘‘Idaṁ ayyassa hotū’’ti, vutte vā pana kenaci;
tika-vin10t1:2220: Paṭikkhittepi taṁ vatthuṁ, ṭhapetvā yadi gacchati;
tika-vin10t1:2221: Tathā gopāyitabbaṁ taṁ, yathā taṁ na vinassati.
tika-vin10t1:2224: Iccevaṁ bhikkhuno vattuṁ, na vaṭṭati akappiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2230: Gahetuṁ aññato laddhaṁ, bhuñjituṁ vā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2232: Yaṁ kiñci pana sambhūtaṁ, paccayaṁ vatthuto tato;
tika-vin10t1:2245: Vatthuṁ nissaggiyassāpi, vatthuṁ vā dukkaṭassa ca;
tika-vin10t1:2246: Kappiyassa ca vatthuṁ vā, yo nissaggiyavatthunā.
tika-vin10t1:2251: Dukkaṭassa ca vatthuṁ vā, vatthuṁ vā kappiyassa ca;
tika-vin10t1:2255: Parivatteti yo tassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2261: Tena dve dukkaṭā honti, cetāpentassa rūpiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2276: Tasmā mātāpitūnampi, vatthuṁ yaṁ kiñci kappiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2279: Sakaṁ vā deti ce bhaṇḍaṁ, evaṁ vatvāna mātuyā;
tika-vin10t1:2280: Mātuyā vā tathā bhaṇḍaṁ, sayaṁ gaṇhāti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2285: ‘‘Gahetvā vā idaṁ nāma, bhuñjitvā odanaṁ imaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2286: Idaṁ nāma karohī’’ti, vattuṁ pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2289: Challiṁ vā pana valliṁ vā, kaṭṭhaṁ vā dārumeva vā.
tika-vin10t1:2302: Nissaggiye ca vatthumhi, naṭṭhe bhuttepi vā yathā;
tika-vin10t1:2308: ‘‘Idaṁ mamatthi attho me, iminā’’ti ca bhāsato;
tika-vin10t1:2314: Tayo pattassa vaṇṇā tu, ukkaṭṭho majjhimomako.
tika-vin10t1:2319: Ukkaṭṭho nāma so patto, yo taṁ sabbaṁ tu gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t1:2320: Majjhimo tassupaḍḍho ca, tadupaḍḍho ca omako.
tika-vin10t1:2323: Evaṁ majjhimaomesu, nava pattā bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t1:2326: Tasmā nāpi adhiṭṭhānaṁ, na gacchanti vikappanaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2334: Yaṁ pattaṁ na vikappeti, yaṁ nādhiṭṭheti vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:2349: Yo hi nissaggiyaṁ pattaṁ, anissajjeva bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t1:2364: Yaṁ kiñci sodakaṁ pattaṁ, paṭisāmeyya dukkaṭaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2367: Bhikkhuno sodakaṁ pattaṁ, otāpetuṁ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2370: Miḍḍhante paribhaṇḍante, ṭhapetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2371: Miḍḍhiyā paribhaṇḍe vā, vitthiṇṇe pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2382: Daṇḍe vā nāgadante vā, laggetumpi na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2389: Bhattapūropi vā chatte, ṭhapetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2392: Kavāṭaṁ na paṇāmeyya, pattahattho sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:2398: Pattaṁ paṭiggahaṁ katvā, dhovituṁ hatthameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:2399: Mukhato nīhaṭaṁ patte, ṭhapetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2401: Anāpatti dasāhassa, antoyeva ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:2408: Pañcabandhanaūnasmiṁ, patte sati ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:2409: Viññāpeyya navaṁ pattaṁ, tassa nissaggiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2414: Pañca vā rājiyo yassa, ekā vāpi dasaṅgulā;
tika-vin10t1:2415: Apatto nāmayaṁ patto, viññāpeyya tato paraṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2418: Baddho vaṭṭati maṭṭho ce, ayocuṇṇena vāṇiyā.
tika-vin10t1:2420: Pattaṁ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṁ, tassa nissaggiyaṁ pana;
tika-vin10t1:2423: Dīyamāne tu pattasmiṁ, yassa so na ca ruccati;
tika-vin10t1:2424: Appicchatāya vā pattaṁ, taṁ na gaṇhāti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2431: Sace so taṁ jigucchanto, appadese ṭhapeti vā;
tika-vin10t1:2434: Naṭṭhe bhinnepi vā patte, anāpatti pakāsitā;
tika-vin10t1:2435: Attano ñātakādīnaṁ, gaṇhato vā dhanena vā.
tika-vin10t1:2444: Tato paṭṭhāya sattāhaṁ, taṁ vaṭṭati nirāmisaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2451: Sarīrabhoge netabbaṁ, sāyituṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2456: Sayaṁ tāpeti ce bhikkhu, sattāhampi nirāmisaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2457: Tāpanaṁ navanītassa, sāmapāko na hoti so.
tika-vin10t1:2459: Pacchābhattaṁ gahetvā ce, yena kenaci tāpitaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2460: Vaṭṭateva ca taṁ sappi, sattāhampi nirāmisaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2467: Pacchābhattakato uddhaṁ, taṁ na vaṭṭati sāyituṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2477: Khīraṁ dadhi ca sappi ca, navanītañca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2479: ‘‘Yesaṁ kappati maṁsañhi, tesaṁ sappī’’ti kiṁ idaṁ?
tika-vin10t1:2489: Telaṁ vā navanītaṁ vā, sappiṁ vā ākiranti hi.
tika-vin10t1:2491: Bhattasitthāni vā tattha, taṇḍulā vā bhavanti ce;
tika-vin10t1:2506: Attanā yaṁ kataṁ telaṁ, taṁ vaṭṭati nirāmisaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2522: Vasānaṁ pana pañcannaṁ, telaṁ pañcavidhaṁ bhave.
tika-vin10t1:2530: Sace anupasampanno, katvā taṁ deti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2533: Paṭiggahetuṁ kātuṁ vā, pacchābhattaṁ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2545: Phāṇitaṁ tu purebhattaṁ, gahitaṁ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2552: Pacchābhattakato uddhaṁ, taṁ na vaṭṭati sāyituṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2555: Hoti tassa anāpatti, pacchābhattaṁ katepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:2558: Tadahe deti ce katvā, sāmisampi ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2567: Pakkhipitvā kataṁ khīraṁ, hoti taṁ yāvakālikaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2575: Labhitvā pana nissaṭṭhaṁ, taṁ tu sattāhakālikaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2576: Aruādīni makkhetuṁ, sāyituṁ vā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2578: Aññassa pana bhikkhussa, kāyabhoge ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2595: Tesuyeva ca viññattiṁ, katvā nipphādane tathā.
tika-vin10t1:2603: Ovassāpeti ce kāyaṁ, naggo satipi cīvare;
tika-vin10t1:2616: Sāmaṁ tu cīvaraṁ datvā, acchindantassa taṁ puna;
tika-vin10t1:2628: Āṇāpeti sace aññaṁ, bhikkhuṁ gaṇhāti cīvaraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2632: Ekāyassa ca vācāya, honti āpattiyo bahū.
tika-vin10t1:2646: So vā deti sace tuṭṭho, duṭṭho vissāsameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:2663: Vīte nissaggiyaṁ vuttaṁ, phalake phalakepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:2674: Sace akappiyaṁ suttaṁ, vāreneva vinanti te;
tika-vin10t1:2680: Dvepi vemaṁ gahetvā vā, ekato vā vinanti ce;
tika-vin10t1:2694: Vikappaṁ cīvare bhikkhu, āpajjati na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2710: Vassacchedo na kātabbo, saṅghikaṁ taṁ karoti ce.
tika-vin10t1:2718: Atthate kathine tassa, pañca māsā pakāsitā;
tika-vin10t1:2726: Ṭhapetvā cīvaraṁ gāme, paccaye sati tādise.
tika-vin10t1:2729: Uttariṁ vasato doso, vinā saṅghassa sammutiṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2737: Yaṁ gāmaṁ gocaraṁ katvā, bhikkhu āraññake vase;
tika-vin10t1:2738: Tasmiṁ gāme ṭhapetuṁ taṁ, māsamekaṁ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2746: Gāmasīmampi vā gantvā, vasitvā yattha katthaci;
tika-vin10t1:2747: Cīvarassa pavattiṁ so, ñatvā gacchati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2750: Khippaṁ paccuddhare ṭhāne, atireke hi tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin10t1:2759: Jānaṁ pariṇataṁ lābhaṁ, bhikkhusaṅghassa yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:2765: Cīvaraṁ vā parasseka-mekaṁ vā pana attano;
tika-vin10t1:2766: Pariṇāmeyya ce saddhiṁ, dve pācittiyo siyuṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2768: Saṅghassa pana yaṁ dinnaṁ, taṁ gahetuṁ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2771: Cetiyassa ca saṅghassa, puggalassapi vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:2797: Bhūtena vā abhūtena, yena kenaci vatthunā.
tika-vin10t1:2799: Yāya kāyaci bhāsāya, hatthamuddāya vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:2827: Na ceva piyakāmassa, na ca bhedatthinopi vā;
tika-vin10t1:2835: Dhammaṁ saha bhaṇantassa, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2840: Dukkaṭaṁ hoti bhikkhusmiṁ, tathā bhikkhuniyāpi ca;
tika-vin10t1:2843: Ekato uddisāpeti, sajjhāyaṁ vā karoti yo;
tika-vin10t1:2844: Bhaṇantaṁ paguṇaṁ ganthaṁ, opāteti ca yo pana.
tika-vin10t1:2847: Uddesaṁ tu anāpatti, bhaṇane tena ekato.
tika-vin10t1:2856: Tissannaṁ pana rattīnaṁ, uddhaṁ yo pana rattiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2857: Ṭhapetvā bhikkhuṁ aññena, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2859: Vatthuṁ yaṁ pana niddiṭṭhaṁ, methunassa pahonakaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2863: Itarasmiṁ nipanne vā, sace bhikkhu nipajjati.
tika-vin10t1:2868: Sace pidhāya vā gabbhaṁ, nipajjatipidhāya vā;
tika-vin10t1:2883: Anāpatti dirattaṁ vā, tirattaṁ vasato saha;
tika-vin10t1:2897: Rattiyaṁ yo nipajjeyya, deviyā paṇḍakena vā.
tika-vin10t1:2907: Vinā dhammaṁ bhaṇantassa, hoti pācitti itthiyā.
tika-vin10t1:2912: Channaṁ upari vācānaṁ, padādīnaṁ vasā pana;
tika-vin10t1:2918: Ṭhitassa mātugāmassa, dhammaṁ yo pana bhāsati;
tika-vin10t1:2919: Channaṁ upari vācānaṁ, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2922: Uttari chahi vācāhi, vadato hoti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2927: Purise sati viññusmiṁ, sayaṁ uṭṭhāya vā puna;
tika-vin10t1:2930: Aññissā puna aññissā, itthiyā bhaṇatopi ca;
tika-vin10t1:2938: Ṭhapetvā bhikkhuniṁ bhikkhuṁ, bhūte pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2940: No ce jānāti so vuttaṁ, ārocentassa bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:2949: Kāyato vācato kāya-vācato ca tidhā siyā;
tika-vin10t1:2960: Tasmā suddhassa duṭṭhullaṁ, vadaṁ pācittiyaṁ phuse.
tika-vin10t1:2968: Vatthuṁ vā pana āpattiṁ, ārocentassa kevalaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2975: Khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya, pathaviṁ yo akappiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2976: Bhedāpeyya ca bhindeyya, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2985: Iccevaṁ tu vadantassa, koci doso na vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:2987: ‘‘Imaṁ khaṇa ca okāsaṁ, idha pokkharaṇiṁ khaṇa;
tika-vin10t1:2988: Imasmiṁ khaṇa okāse’’, vattumevaṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2990: ‘‘Kandaṁ khaṇa kurundaṁ vā, thūṇaṁ khaṇa ca khāṇukaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2991: Mūlaṁ khaṇa ca tālaṁ vā’’, evaṁ vadati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2993: ‘‘Imaṁ mūlaṁ imaṁ valliṁ, imaṁ tālaṁ imaṁ naḷaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2994: Khaṇā’’ti niyametvāna, vattuṁ pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2997: Bhikkhunā apanetabbo, bahalaṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3002: Sace patati toyasmiṁ, deve vuṭṭhepi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3005: Pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṁ soṇḍiṁ, khaṇanti yadi tattha tu;
tika-vin10t1:3006: Rajaṁ patati ce pubbaṁ, pacchā devobhivassati.
tika-vin10t1:3011: Vārinā paṭhamaṁ puṇṇe, pacchā patati ce rajaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3012: Taṁ vaṭṭati vikopetuṁ, toye devo hi vassati.
tika-vin10t1:3020: Abbhokāse sace vaṭṭho, cātumāsaṁ tu vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3039: Anovaṭṭho ca bhikkhūnaṁ, sabbadā hoti kappiyo.
tika-vin10t1:3041: Vuṭṭhe puna ca gehasmiṁ, gehaṁ chādenti taṁ sace;
tika-vin10t1:3044: Yattakaṁ tattha tintaṁ tu, tattakaṁ hotyakappiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3045: Atintaṁ tattha yaṁ yaṁ tu, taṁ taṁ hoti hi kappiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3047: Temito vārinā so ce, ekābaddhova bhūmiyā;
tika-vin10t1:3048: Pathavī ceva sā jātā, na vaṭṭati tato paraṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3053: Tattha laggaṁ rajaṁ saṇhaṁ, aghaṁsantova mattaso;
tika-vin10t1:3057: Ṭhāne tiṭṭhati so tasmā, vikopeyya yathāsukhaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3059: Abbhokāse ṭhitaṁ thambhaṁ, cāletvā panito cito;
tika-vin10t1:3060: Pathaviṁ tu vikopetvā, gahetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3062: Aññampi sukkharukkhaṁ vā, khāṇukaṁ vāpi gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t1:3063: Ayameva nayo doso, ujumuddharato na ca.
tika-vin10t1:3065: Pāsāṇaṁ yadi vā rukkhaṁ, uccāletvā pavaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3066: Na doso suddhacittassa, sace pathavi bhijjati.
tika-vin10t1:3071: Kaṇṭakaṁ sūcimaṭṭhiṁ vā, khilaṁ vā bhūmiyaṁ pana;
tika-vin10t1:3072: Ākoṭetuṁ pavesetuṁ, bhikkhuno na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3075: Bhikkhussa pana passāva-mevaṁ kātuṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3078: Samajjato samaṁ kātuṁ, ghaṁsituṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3080: Pādaṅguṭṭhena vā bhūmiṁ, likhitumpi na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3081: Bhindantena ca pādehi, tathā caṅkamitumpi vā.
tika-vin10t1:3084: Aghaṁsanto gahetvā ce, hatthaṁ dhovati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3086: Sayaṁ dahati ce bhūmiṁ, dahāpeti parehi vā;
tika-vin10t1:3089: Ṭhānesu yattakesvaggiṁ, deti dāpeti vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:3092: Ṭhapetuṁ bhikkhuno aggiṁ, bhūmiyaṁ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3095: Aggiṁ upari dārūnaṁ, ṭhapetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3096: Dahanto tāni gantvā so, bhūmiṁ dahati ce pana.
tika-vin10t1:3102: Khāṇuke sukkharukkhe vā, aggiṁ dātuṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3104: Anāpatti tiṇukkaṁ tu, gahetvā pana gacchato;
tika-vin10t1:3105: Ḍayhamāne tu hatthasmiṁ, sace pāteti bhūmiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3107: Puna taṁ patitaṭṭhāne, datvā tassa panindhanaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3121: Udakaṭṭho thalaṭṭhoti, duvidho hoti so pana;
tika-vin10t1:3125: Vikopentassa taṁ sabbaṁ, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3127: Viyūhitvā tu hatthena, nhāyituṁ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3128: Hoti tassa ca sabbampi, ṭhānañhi sakalaṁ jalaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3130: Udakena vinā cecca, taṁ panuddharituṁ jalā;
tika-vin10t1:3131: Na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhussa, ṭhānasaṅkamanañhi taṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3137: Vikopentassa vā tattha, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:3140: Gacchanti hi yato tāni, bījagāmena saṅgahaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3146: Tasmā tassa kato hoti, bījagāmena saṅgaho.
tika-vin10t1:3149: Aphalitāya yo khāṇu, bhūtagāmena so mato.
tika-vin10t1:3151: Phalitā kadalī yāva, nīlapaṇṇā ca tāva sā;
tika-vin10t1:3154: Aggato pana paṭṭhāya, yadāyaṁ veḷu sussati;
tika-vin10t1:3163: Mūlamattepi vā yesaṁ, paṇṇamattepi vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:3167: Pattavaṭṭi yadā nīlā, niggacchati tadā na ca.
tika-vin10t1:3180: Vandākā vāpi aññaṁ vā, rukkhe jāyati yaṁ pana.
tika-vin10t1:3182: Rukkhovassa siyā ṭhānaṁ, vikopetuṁ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3186: Yāva dve tīṇi pattāni, na sañjāyanti tāva so.
tika-vin10t1:3188: Pattesu pana jātesu, vatthu pācittiyassa so;
tika-vin10t1:3189: Ghaṁsitvā pana taṁ tasmā, apanetuṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3198: Sace taṁ makuḷaṁ hoti, hoti dukkaṭavatthukaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3200: Rukkhe tacaṁ vikopetvā, tathā pappaṭikampi ca;
tika-vin10t1:3201: Niyyāsampi panallasmiṁ, gahetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3206: Pupphaṁ paṇḍupalāsaṁ vā, phalaṁ vā pakkameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:3209: Nāmetvā phaliniṁ sākhaṁ, dātuṁ vaṭṭati gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t1:3210: Sayaṁ khāditukāmo ce, dātumevaṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3215: Yesaṁ ruhati rukkhānaṁ, sākhā tesampi sākhinaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3221: ‘‘Rukkhaṁ chinda lataṁ chinda, kandaṁ mūlampi uddhara;
tika-vin10t1:3224: ‘‘Ambaṁ jambumpi nimbaṁ vā, chinda bhinduddharā’’ti vā;
tika-vin10t1:3227: ‘‘Imaṁ rukkhaṁ imaṁ valliṁ, imaṁ challiṁ imaṁ lataṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3228: Chinda bhindā’’ti vā vattuṁ, niyametvā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3231: Sabbameva kataṁ hoti, ekasmiṁ kappiye kate.
tika-vin10t1:3233: Ekato pana baddhāni, ucchudārūni honti ce;
tika-vin10t1:3234: Kappiyaṁ karonto pana, dāruṁ vijjhati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3236: Valliyā rajjuyā vāpi, yāya baddhāni tāni hi;
tika-vin10t1:3237: Bhājanena samānattā, taṁ vijjhati na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3245: Kaṭāhaṁ yadi muñcitvā, anto carati miñjakaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3246: Bhindāpetvā kapitthaṁ taṁ, kāretabbaṁ tu kappiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3262: Kamme aropite cevaṁ, vadantassa ca dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3281: Vadato dukkaṭaṁ hoti, yassa kassaci santike.
tika-vin10t1:3287: Ajjhokāse tu mañcādiṁ, attano vā parassa vā;
tika-vin10t1:3290: Nevuddhareyya saṅghassa, uddharāpeyya vā na taṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3291: Pakkamanto sace tassa, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:3293: Vassike caturo māse, sace devo na vassati;
tika-vin10t1:3294: Ajjhokāse tathā cāpi, ṭhapetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3296: Yattha vassati hemante, cattāro aparepi ca;
tika-vin10t1:3297: Ṭhapetuṁ tattha mañcādiṁ, aṭṭha māse na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3300: Mañcādiṁ pana saṅghassa, ṭhapetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3302: Aññassatthāya yaṁ kiñci, santhataṁ yadi saṅghikaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3303: Yattha katthaci vā ṭhāne, yena kenaci bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:3305: Yāva so na nisīdeyya, ‘‘gacchā’’ti na vadeyya vā;
tika-vin10t1:3311: Santhataṁ bhikkhunā taṁ ce, bhāro tasseva tāva taṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3312: Yāva āṇāpako tattha, āgantvā na nisīdati.
tika-vin10t1:3323: Nikkhamitvā sace tasmā, ṭhānā aññattha gacchati;
tika-vin10t1:3333: Abbhokāse ṭhapetvā taṁ, gacchato hoti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3335: Sace āraññakenāpi, anovasse ca no sati;
tika-vin10t1:3336: Laggetvā pana rukkhasmiṁ, gantabbaṁ tu yathāsukhaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3338: Yathā upacikādīhi, na khajjati na lujjati;
tika-vin10t1:3339: Tathā katvāpi taṁ sabbaṁ, gantuṁ pana ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3354: Etaṁ dasavidhaṁ seyyaṁ, santharitvāpi vā sayaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3358: Paṭhame dukkaṭaṁ pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3372: Sāpekkhova ca gantvā taṁ, tattha ṭhatvāpi pucchati;
tika-vin10t1:3376: Yo pubbupagataṁ bhikkhuṁ, jānaṁ anupakhajja ca;
tika-vin10t1:3380: Yāva taṁ mañcapīṭhaṁ vā, nikkhamantassa vā pana.
tika-vin10t1:3388: Nisīdantassa vā tattha, nipajjantassa vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:3398: Sabbattha dukkaṭaṁ vuttaṁ, nivāso ca nivārito.
tika-vin10t1:3407: Vihārā saṅghikā bhikkhuṁ, nikkaḍḍheyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:3408: Nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā kuddho, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3411: Nikkaḍḍheti sace tassa, ekā pācitti dīpitā.
tika-vin10t1:3413: Ṭhapetvā ca ṭhapetvā ca, nikkaḍḍhantassa antarā;
tika-vin10t1:3419: Sace so sakimāṇatto, dvārepi bahuke pana;
tika-vin10t1:3423: Kāyenapi ca vācāya, tathā nikkaḍḍhanepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:3442: Āhaccapādake mañce, pīṭhe vā pana bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:3444: Nisīdantassa vā tasmiṁ, nipajjantassa vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:3448: Heṭṭhā aparibhoge vā, sīsaghaṭṭāya vā pana.
tika-vin10t1:3453: Yattha paṭāṇi vā dinnā, tattha ṭhatvā lageti vā;
tika-vin10t1:3463: Adhiṭṭheyyaṁ tato uddhaṁ, adhiṭṭheti sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:3464: Tassa pācittiyaṁ hoti, dukkaṭaṁ tattha tiṭṭhato.
tika-vin10t1:3467: Yasmiṁ ṭhāne ṭhitaṁ bhikkhuṁ, olokento na passati.
tika-vin10t1:3469: Tasmiṁ ṭhāne pana ṭhātuṁ, neva bhikkhussa vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3475: Na doso dvattipariyāye, leṇe tiṇakuṭīsu vā;
tika-vin10t1:3479: Jānaṁ sappāṇakaṁ toyaṁ, tiṇaṁ vā mattikampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:3480: Yadi siñceyya pācitti, siñcāpeyya parehi vā.
tika-vin10t1:3482: Acchinditvā sace dhāraṁ, mattikaṁ siñcato pana;
tika-vin10t1:3488: Ekāva ce siyāpatti, divasampi ca sandatu;
tika-vin10t1:3495: Khayaṁ vā āvilattaṁ vā, jalaṁ gacchati tādise.
tika-vin10t1:3523: Osārentova te dhamme, ovadeyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:3539: Ṭhapetvā dukkaṭaṁ bālaṁ, gilānaṁ gamikaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3541: Adhamme pana kammasmiṁ, adhammanti ca saññino;
tika-vin10t1:3545: Nava pācittiyo vuttā, samaggepi ca tattakā.
tika-vin10t1:3547: Navakānaṁ vasā dvinnaṁ, aṭṭhārasa bhavanti tā;
tika-vin10t1:3550: ‘‘Osārehī’’ti vutto vā, pañhaṁ puṭṭho katheti vā;
tika-vin10t1:3566: Catūsvapi nikāyesu, eko vā potthakopi ca.
tika-vin10t1:3598: Atthaṅgate ca sūriye, sace vadati tīṇipi.
tika-vin10t1:3617: Vadato sammate bhikkhu, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3629: Sace bhikkhuniyā bhikkhu, dadeyya pana cīvaraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3635: Tattha bhikkhuniyā dinnaṁ, cīvaraṁ idha bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:3639: Cīvaraṁ yo hi sibbeyya, sibbāpeyya parena vā;
tika-vin10t1:3642: Yaṁ vā nivāsituṁ sakkā, yaṁ vā pārupanūpagaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3645: Sayaṁ sūciṁ pavesetvā, sibbantassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:3649: Ekaṁ pācittiyaṁ vuttaṁ, payogassa vasā bahū.
tika-vin10t1:3652: Niṭṭhāpeti sace sabbaṁ, ekaṁ pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3654: ‘‘Yamettha cīvare kammaṁ, bhāro sabbaṁ tavā’’ti hi;
tika-vin10t1:3655: Āṇatto bhikkhunā sabbaṁ, niṭṭhāpeti sace pana.
tika-vin10t1:3661: Kā hi nāma kathā atthi? Tikapācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3674: Paṭipajjeyya maggaṁ ce, aññatra samayā idha.
tika-vin10t1:3677: Agāmake araññe vā, hoti āpatti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:3719: Tathā saṁvidahitvā vā, tiriyaṁ taraṇāya vā;
tika-vin10t1:3726: Bhojanaṁ pañcadhā vuttaṁ, gahaṇe tassa dukkaṭaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3738: Aññaṁ vā pana yaṁ kiñci, ṭhapetvā pañcabhojanaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3754: Bhuñjitabbaṁ sakiṁ tattha, tato uddhaṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3756: Dutiye divase tattha, gahaṇe dukkaṭaṁ mataṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3762: Nānāṭṭhānesu paññatto, yo ca, nānākulehi vā;
tika-vin10t1:3763: Bhuñjato pana sabbattha, na doso paṭipāṭiyā.
tika-vin10t1:3766: Ādito pana paṭṭhāya, na ca kappati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:3769: Odissapi ca paññatte, paritte bhuñjato sakiṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3776: Gaṇoti pana niddiṭṭhā, cattāro vā tatuttariṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3778: Yaṁ nimantanato vāpi, laddhaṁ viññattitopi vā;
tika-vin10t1:3779: Bhojanaṁ pana pañcannaṁ, hoti aññataraṁ idha.
tika-vin10t1:3782: Nimanteti sace bhikkhū, cattāro bahukepi vā.
tika-vin10t1:3787: Tato tassa ca te bhikkhū, sādiyitvā nimantanaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3788: Ekato nānato vā ce, gantvā gaṇhanti ekato.
tika-vin10t1:3793: Ekato nānato vāpi, gamanaṁ bhojanampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:3794: Kāraṇanti na taṁ viññū, bhaṇanti gaṇabhojane.
tika-vin10t1:3799: Nānato vekato gantvā, sace gaṇhanti ekato;
tika-vin10t1:3806: Gahetvā ekato dvinnaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ vā bhuñjataṁ tathā.
tika-vin10t1:3815: Nattheva ca visaṅketaṁ, yāguādīsu taṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3835: Bhojanānaṁ tu pañcannaṁ, yena kena nimantito;
tika-vin10t1:3836: Taṁ ṭhapetvā sace aññaṁ, bhojanaṁ paribhuñjati.
tika-vin10t1:3841: Yattha khīraṁ rasaṁ vāpi, ākiranti sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:3851: Nimantitassa vā nicca-bhatte doso na vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:3858: Pātheyyatthāya manthā vā, ye hi tattha ca bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:3861: Tato ce uttariṁ tassa, hoti pācitti gaṇhato.
tika-vin10t1:3864: Gahitā pana pūvā’’ti, bhikkhuṁ disvā vade budho.
tika-vin10t1:3867: Gaṇhatopi ca taṁ sutvā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3872: Yena tattha tayo laddhā, pattapūrā tato pana;
tika-vin10t1:3873: Dve saṅghassa padātabbā, dve ce eko, na ekato.
tika-vin10t1:3888: Odano sattu kummāso, maccho maṁsanti sabbaso;
tika-vin10t1:3891: Odano tattha sattannaṁ, dhaññānaṁ odano mato;
tika-vin10t1:3897: Sāli vīhi yavo kaṅgu, varako godhumo tathā;
tika-vin10t1:3903: Sattannaṁ pana dhaññānaṁ, odano yāgu vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:3906: Hatthena gahitokāse, odhiṁ dasseti yā pana;
tika-vin10t1:3909: Abbhuṇhā pana yā yāgu, uddhanoropitā tanu;
tika-vin10t1:3910: Sace odhiṁ na dasseti, na janeti pavāraṇaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3912: Puna sā sītalībhūtā, ghanabhāvaṁ gatā sace;
tika-vin10t1:3913: Odhiṁ dasseti so pubbe, tanubhāvo na rakkhati.
tika-vin10t1:3919: Odhiṁ pana ca dasseti, sañjaneti pavāraṇaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3922: ‘‘Yāguṁ gaṇhatha, yāgu’’nti, vatvā denti sace pana.
tika-vin10t1:3925: Taṁ pacitvā sace denti, yāgusaṅgahitā pana.
tika-vin10t1:3936: Puthukā vā tato tāhi, katabhattampi sattupi;
tika-vin10t1:3937: Suddhā na pana pūvā vā, pavārenti kadācipi.
tika-vin10t1:3940: Koṭṭetvā denti taṁ cuṇṇaṁ, sattusaṅgahitaṁ mataṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3942: Bhajjitānaṁ tu vīhīnaṁ, na pavārenti taṇḍulā;
tika-vin10t1:3943: Tesaṁ pana ca yaṁ cuṇṇaṁ, taṁ janeti pavāraṇaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3949: Kuṇḍakaṁ pana vīhīnaṁ, na janeti pavāraṇaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3951: Lājā vā pana teheva, katabhattampi sattu vā;
tika-vin10t1:3952: Khajjakaṁ pana suddhaṁ vā, na janeti pavāraṇaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3955: Yaṁ kiñci bhajjitaṁ piṭṭhaṁ, na pavāreti suddhakaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3961: Na so tena pavāreti, avatthuttāti dīpitaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3966: Maṁsaṁ pana ca khādanto, kappiyaṁ vā akappiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3970: Nisedhaṁ na pavāreti, tathā aññaṁ akappiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3973: Patte hatthe mukhe vāpi, bhojanaṁ pana vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:3976: Pavāreti sace natthi, na pavāreti katthaci.
tika-vin10t1:3978: Gilitvā ca mukhe bhattaṁ, sesamādāya gacchati;
tika-vin10t1:3979: Antarā ca nisedhento, na pavāreti bhojanaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3986: Asanassa upacchedā, na pavāreti soti hi;
tika-vin10t1:3989: Gaṇhato pacchimaṁ aṅgaṁ, dadato purimaṁ pana;
tika-vin10t1:3990: Ubhinnaṁ aḍḍhateyyaṁ ce, vinā hatthaṁ pasāritaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3995: Hatthe ādhārake vāpi, pattaṁ ūrūsu vā ṭhitaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4005: Pidahanto sakaṁ pattaṁ, hatthehi na pavārito.
tika-vin10t1:4008: Kāyena vāpi vācāya, hoti kassa pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t1:4013: Sace vadati tassāpi, na panatthi pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t1:4016: Samaṁsañhi rasaṁ netvā, gaṇhathāti rasaṁ vade;
tika-vin10t1:4017: Taṁ sutvā ca nisedhento, neva hoti pavārito.
tika-vin10t1:4022: Sace maṁsaṁ visuṁ katvā, ‘‘gaṇha maṁsarasa’’nti vā;
tika-vin10t1:4023: Vadeyyatthi ca maṁsaṁ ce, paṭikkhepe pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t1:4031: Vadanti ce paṭikkhepe, neva hoti pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t1:4037: Eseva ca nayo vutto, ñeyyo maṁsakarambake;
tika-vin10t1:4046: ‘‘Yāgumissakaṁ gaṇhā’’ti, vutte tattha ca yāgu ce;
tika-vin10t1:4047: Samā bahutarā vā sā, na pavāreti so kira.
tika-vin10t1:4049: Mandā yāgu, bahuṁ bhattaṁ, sace hoti pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t1:4050: Idaṁ sabbattha niddiṭṭhaṁ, kāraṇaṁ pana duddasaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4052: Rasaṁ bahurase bhatte, khīraṁ vā bahukhīrake;
tika-vin10t1:4053: Gaṇhathāti visuṁ katvā, deti natthi pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t1:4058: Udakaṁ vāpi patvā so, sace tiṭṭhati kaddamaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4059: Atirittaṁ tu kāretvā, bhuñjitabbaṁ tato puna.
tika-vin10t1:4061: Pīṭhake yo nisīditvā, pavāreti sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:4064: Sace mañce nisīditvā, pavāreti tato pana;
tika-vin10t1:4065: Ito saṁsarituṁ etto, īsakampi na labbhati.
tika-vin10t1:4067: Tena mañcena naṁ saddhiṁ, vaṭṭataññatra nenti ce;
tika-vin10t1:4076: Kappiyaṁ pana kātabbaṁ, na patteyeva kevalaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4077: Pacchiyaṁ yadi vā kuṇḍe, kātuṁ vaṭṭati bhājane.
tika-vin10t1:4085: Byañjanaṁ vāpi yaṁ kiñci, patte tassākiranti ce.
tika-vin10t1:4087: Atirittaṁ tu kāretvā, bhuñjitabbaṁ tathā puna;
tika-vin10t1:4088: Yena taṁ akataṁ yaṁ vā, kātabbaṁ tena taṁ visuṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4093: Yopi pātova ekampi, sitthaṁ bhutvā nisīdati;
tika-vin10t1:4110: Jānaṁ āsādanāpekkho, bhutte pācitti tassa tu.
tika-vin10t1:4112: Dukkaṭaṁ abhihāre ca, gahaṇe itarassa hi;
tika-vin10t1:4136: Mūlaṁ kandaṁ muḷālañca, matthakaṁ khandhakaṁ tacaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4137: Pattaṁ pupphaṁ phalaṁ aṭṭhi, piṭṭhaṁ niyyāsameva ca.
tika-vin10t1:4146: Saṅgahaṁ idha gacchanti, āhāratthaṁ pharanti hi.
tika-vin10t1:4148: Chaḍḍenti jaraṭṭhaṁ chetvā, yaṁ taṁ vajakalissa tu;
tika-vin10t1:4181: Sattannaṁ pana dhaññānaṁ, kaḷīro sāsapassa ca.
tika-vin10t1:4199: Vatthulo cīnamuggo ca, ummā vajakalī tathā.
tika-vin10t1:4201: Jajjharī kāsamaddo ca, sellu siggu ca nāḷikā;
tika-vin10t1:4204: Rājamāso ca māso ca, nipphāvo migapupphikā;
tika-vin10t1:4217: Tathā pupphaṁ karīrassa, pupphaṁ varuṇakassa ca.
tika-vin10t1:4237: Labujassa ca cocassa, mocassa madhukassa ca.
tika-vin10t1:4263: Tālapiṭṭhaṁ tathā dhotaṁ, piṭṭhaṁ yaṁ khīravalliyā;
tika-vin10t1:4282: Bhojanaṁ sannidhiṁ katvā, khādanaṁ vāpi yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:4283: Bhuñjeyya vāpi khādeyya, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:4286: Nidahitvā sace tassa, denti taṁ puna vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4289: Dutiye divase tassa, nihitaṁ taṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4303: Thullaccayena saddhiṁ dve, maṁse mānusake siyuṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4304: Sese akappiye maṁse, dukkaṭena saha dvayaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4310: Dvīsu tesu vikappesu, dukkaṭaṁ pana vaḍḍhati.
tika-vin10t1:4330: Kālo yāmo ca sattāhaṁ, iti kālattayaṁ idaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4331: Atikkamayato doso, kālaṁ taṁ taṁ tu kālikaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4343: Gahitaṁ tadahe vāpi, dvayaṁ pubbaṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4346: Iti vuttaṁ daḷhaṁ katvā, mahāpaccariyaṁ pana.
tika-vin10t1:4349: Taṁ taṁ sakaṁ sakaṁ kāla-manatikkamma bhuñjato.
tika-vin10t1:4361: Viññāpetvā tathā taṁ ce, dukkaṭaṁ paṭigaṇhato;
tika-vin10t1:4376: Yena yena hi viññattaṁ, tasmiṁ mūlepi tassa vā;
tika-vin10t1:4377: Laddhepi pana taṁ laddhaṁ, hotiyeva na aññathā.
tika-vin10t1:4385: Akappiyena vuttepi, sappinā deti tena ce;
tika-vin10t1:4402: Manusso vāmanusso vā, deti kāyādinā tidhā.
tika-vin10t1:4404: Paṭiggaṇhāti taṁ bhikkhu, dīyamānaṁ sace dvidhā;
tika-vin10t1:4407: Dāyako gaganaṭṭho ce, bhūmaṭṭho cetaro siyā;
tika-vin10t1:4411: Dātuṁ vāpi gahetuṁ vā, vinā hatthaṁ pasāritaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4414: Evarūpe pana ṭhāne, ṭhatvā ce deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4416: Pakkhī vā mukhatuṇḍena, hatthī soṇḍāya vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:4417: Sace yaṁ kiñci pupphaṁ vā, phalaṁ vā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4423: Tena hatthaṁ pasāretvā, heṭṭhimaṁ pana bhājanaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4425: Paṭicchitabbaṁ taṁ eka- desenāpi ca bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:4428: Tato paṭṭhāya taṁ sabbaṁ, oropetvā yathāsukhaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4429: Ugghāṭetvā tato iṭṭhaṁ, gahetuṁ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4432: Kājabhattaṁ haranto ce, onatvā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4434: Tiṁsahattho siyā veḷu, antesu ca duve ghaṭā;
tika-vin10t1:4437: Bahupattā ca mañce vā, pīṭhe vā kaṭasārake;
tika-vin10t1:4438: Ṭhapitā dāyako hattha-pāse ṭhatvāna deti ce.
tika-vin10t1:4441: Nisīdati phusitvā yo, yañca pattesu dīyati.
tika-vin10t1:4443: Gahitaṁ tena taṁ sabbaṁ, hotiyeva na saṁsayo;
tika-vin10t1:4446: Gahitaṁ hoti taṁ sabbaṁ, āruhitvā nisīdati;
tika-vin10t1:4447: Āhacca kucchiyā kucchiṁ, ṭhitā pattā hi bhūmiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4449: Yaṁ yaṁ aṅguliyā vāpi, phusitvā sūciyāpi vā;
tika-vin10t1:4450: Nisinno tattha tattheva, dīyamānaṁ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4456: Na panetāni kāyena, paṭibaddhāni honti hi.
tika-vin10t1:4459: Khāṇubaddhepi vā mañce, gahaṇaṁ neva rūhati.
tika-vin10t1:4467: Sace patte rajo hoti, dhovitabbo jale sati;
tika-vin10t1:4470: Piṇḍāya vicarantassa, rajaṁ patati ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:4477: Asutvānādiyitvā vā, denti ce natthi dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4480: Sace rajaṁ nipāteti, mahāvāto tato tato.
tika-vin10t1:4482: Na sakkā ca siyā bhikkhaṁ, gahetuṁ yadi bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:4485: Sāmaṇerassa taṁ datvā, dinnaṁ vā tena taṁ puna;
tika-vin10t1:4486: Tassa vissāsato vāpi, bhuñjituṁ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4488: Bhikkhācāre sace bhattaṁ, sarajaṁ deti bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:4489: ‘‘Paṭiggahetvā bhikkhaṁ tvaṁ, gaṇha vā bhuñja vā’’ti ca.
tika-vin10t1:4491: Vattabbo so tathā tena, kattabbañceva bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:4492: Rajaṁ upari bhattassa, tassuplavati ce pana.
tika-vin10t1:4495: Anto paṭiggahetabbaṁ, paviṭṭhaṁ tu sace pana.
tika-vin10t1:4497: Patitaṁ sukkhabhatte ce, apanīyāva taṁ rajaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4501: Thevo uḷuṅkato patte, sace patati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4503: Bhatte ākiramāne tu, carukena tato pana;
tika-vin10t1:4504: Masi vā chārikā vāpi, sace patati bhājane.
tika-vin10t1:4509: Uppabhitvā sace patte, itarassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:4512: Pāyāsassa ca pūretvā, pattaṁ ce denti bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:4513: Uṇhattā pana taṁ heṭṭhā, gahetuṁ na ca sakkati.
tika-vin10t1:4516: Na sakkā ce gahetabbo, tathā ādhārakenapi.
tika-vin10t1:4522: Ābhogaṁ pana katvā ce, nisinno hoti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4524: Sace hatthena muñcitvā, pattaṁ ādhārakampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:4525: Pelletvā pana pādena, niddāyati hi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4530: Tasmā taṁ na ca kātabbaṁ, bhikkhunā vinayaññunā;
tika-vin10t1:4531: Yaṁ dīyamānaṁ patati, gahetuṁ taṁ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4533: Bhuñjantānañca dantā vā, khīyantipi nakhāpi vā;
tika-vin10t1:4534: Tathā pattassa vaṇṇo vā, abbohāranayo ayaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4537: Paññāyati hi taṁ tesu, siyā navasamuṭṭhitaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4539: Paṭiggahetvā taṁ pacchā, khāditabbaṁ tu bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:4540: Na paññāyati ce tasmiṁ, malaṁ vaṭṭati khādituṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4545: Bhesajjatthāya tāpetvā, vāsiṁ khīre khipanti ce;
tika-vin10t1:4546: Uṭṭheti nīlikā tattha, satthake viya nicchayo.
tika-vin10t1:4548: Sace āmakatakke vā, khīre vā pakkhipanti taṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4552: Patte patati ce toyaṁ, kiliṭṭhaṁ kāyavatthato.
tika-vin10t1:4555: Eseva ca nayo vutto, rukkhamūlepi bhuñjato.
tika-vin10t1:4557: Sattāhaṁ pana vassante, deve suddhaṁ jalaṁ sace;
tika-vin10t1:4558: Abbhokāsepi vā patte, toyaṁ patati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4563: Paṭiggahetvā vā pattaṁ, dātabbo tassa odano;
tika-vin10t1:4564: Chupitvā deti ce bhattaṁ, taṁ panuggahitaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:4570: Sace vadati pacchā taṁ, paṭiggaṇheyya paṇḍito.
tika-vin10t1:4573: ‘‘Etto pūvampi bhattaṁ vā, kiñci gaṇhā’’ti bhāsati.
tika-vin10t1:4579: Taṁpaṭiggahaṇe kiccaṁ, puna tassa na vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:4588: Patitaṁ hatthato tasmiṁ, na karoti akappiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4591: Bhuñjitabbaṁ tu taṁ katvā, pattaṁ viya nirāmisaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4593: Sace yāgukuṭaṁ puṇṇaṁ, sāmaṇero hi dubbalo;
tika-vin10t1:4594: Bhikkhuṁ paṭiggahāpetuṁ, na sakkoti hi taṁ puna.
tika-vin10t1:4599: Atha vā bhūmiyaṁyeva, hatthe bhikkhu ṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t1:4600: Āropeti pavaṭṭetvā, tattha ce pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4603: Dve tayo sāmaṇerā vā, denti ce gahaṇūpagaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4606: Ekena vā tathā dinnaṁ, gaṇhanti dve tayopi vā.
tika-vin10t1:4612: Sammujjanto ca ghaṭṭeti, na panuggahitaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:4615: Gaṇhitvā puna taṁ ñatvā, ṭhapetuṁ tattha vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4617: Vivaritvā sace pubbe, ṭhapitaṁ pihitampi ca;
tika-vin10t1:4618: Tatheva taṁ ṭhapetabbaṁ, kattabbaṁ na panaññathā.
tika-vin10t1:4620: Bahi ṭhapeti ce tena, chupitabbaṁ na taṁ puna;
tika-vin10t1:4621: Yadi chupati ce ñatvā, taṁ panuggahitaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:4627: Paṭiggahaṇakiccaṁ tu, tasmiṁ puna na vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:4629: Tālaṁ vā nāḷikeraṁ vā, āruḷho koci puggalo;
tika-vin10t1:4633: Tamañño pana bhūmaṭṭho, gahetvā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4635: Chinditvā ce vatiṁ ucchuṁ, phalaṁ vā deti gaṇhituṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4638: Sace na puthulo hoti, pākāro atiuccako;
tika-vin10t1:4641: Uddhaṁ hatthasataṁ gantvā, sampattaṁ puna taṁ pana;
tika-vin10t1:4644: Bhikkhuno sāmaṇeraṁ tu, khandhena vahato sace;
tika-vin10t1:4645: Phalaṁ gahetvā tattheva, nisinno deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4647: Aparopi vahantova, bhikkhuṁ yo koci puggalo;
tika-vin10t1:4648: Phalaṁ khandhe nisinnassa, bhikkhuno deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4650: Gahetvā phaliniṁ sākhaṁ, chāyatthaṁ yadi gacchati;
tika-vin10t1:4651: Puna citte samuppanne, khādituṁ pana bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:4656: Kappiyaṁ pana kāretvā, paṭiggaṇhāti taṁ puna;
tika-vin10t1:4660: Gacchanto antarāmagge, yaṁ icchati tato pana.
tika-vin10t1:4668: Taṇḍulesu hi khīṇesu, attanā gahitesu so;
tika-vin10t1:4672: Yāguṁ bhikkhussa taṁ datvā, sayaṁ pivati tassa ce.
tika-vin10t1:4680: Tasmā hissa visesassa, cintetabbaṁ tu kāraṇaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4684: Na sakkoti sace te ca, taṇḍule bhājanampi ca.
tika-vin10t1:4695: Tatte panudake koci, ce pakkhipati taṇḍule;
tika-vin10t1:4696: Tato paṭṭhāya tenaggi, na kātabbova bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:4698: Paṭiggahetvā taṁ yāguṁ, pātuṁ vaṭṭati bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:4699: Sace pacati pacchā taṁ, sāmapākā na muccati.
tika-vin10t1:4702: Tasseva ca tato laddhaṁ, phalaṁ kiñci na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4705: Kaṇṭake bandhituṁ vāpi, bhikkhuno kira vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4707: Saṇḍāsena ca dīghena, gahetvā thālakaṁ pana;
tika-vin10t1:4708: Pacato bhikkhuno telaṁ, bhasmaṁ patati tattha ce.
tika-vin10t1:4713: Paṭiggahetvā aṅgāre, tāni dārūni vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:4716: Ucchuṁ khādati ce bhikkhu, sāmaṇeropi icchati;
tika-vin10t1:4717: ‘‘Chinditvā tvamito gaṇha’’, iti vutto ca gaṇhati.
tika-vin10t1:4728: Udakena samā vuttā, himassa karakāpi ca;
tika-vin10t1:4729: Kūpādīsu jalaṁ pātuṁ, bahalampi ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4731: Khettesu kasitaṭṭhāne, bahalaṁ taṁ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:4732: Sanditvā yadi taṁ gantvā, nadiṁ pūreti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4735: Na ñāyati raso tesaṁ, na paṭiggahaṇakāraṇaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4738: Pakkhittāni sace honti, paṭiggaṇheyya taṁ pana.
tika-vin10t1:4744: Ajānantassa pācitti, so ce visati khādato.
tika-vin10t1:4746: Sarīraṭṭhesu bhūtesu, kiṁ vaṭṭati? Na vaṭṭati?
tika-vin10t1:4750: Semhaṁ siṅghāṇikā kheḷo, assu loṇanti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4752: Yaṁ panettha sakaṭṭhānā, cavitvā patitaṁ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:4753: Patte vā pana hatthe vā, paṭiggaṇheyya taṁ puna.
tika-vin10t1:4794: Udakaṁ dantaponaṁ vā, dentassa ca atitthiye;
tika-vin10t1:4795: Titthiyoti ca saññissa, dukkaṭaṁ vimatissa ca.
tika-vin10t1:4804: Dāpetvā vā adāpetvā, bhikkhu yaṁ kiñci āmisaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4814: Pamāṇaṁ savane cevaṁ, ajjhokāse na cetare.
tika-vin10t1:4824: Sabhojane kule tassa, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:4833: Vītarāgesu vā tesu, nikkhantesu ubhosu vā.
tika-vin10t1:4839: Catutthe pañcame ceva, vattabbaṁ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t1:4840: Vattabbaṁ yañca taṁ sabbaṁ, vuttaṁ aniyatadvaye.
tika-vin10t1:4846: Bhojanānaṁ tu pañcannaṁ, vutto aññatarena yo;
tika-vin10t1:4849: Cārittaṁ tassa pācitti, aññatra samayā siyā;
tika-vin10t1:4858: Ṭhitaṭṭhāne sace bhikkhuṁ, oloketvā na passati;
tika-vin10t1:4861: Sace dūre ṭhito hoti, asanto nāma bhikkhu so;
tika-vin10t1:4862: Natthi ārocane kiccaṁ, gavesitvā ito cito.
tika-vin10t1:4864: Na doso samaye santaṁ, āpucchitvā ca gacchato;
tika-vin10t1:4865: Bhikkhuṁ gharena maggo ce, ārāmaṁ gacchatopi ca.
tika-vin10t1:4870: Idaṁ pana samuṭṭhānaṁ, kathinena samaṁ mataṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4878: Na paṭikkhipitabbā sā, ‘‘rogo dāni na me’’ti ca.
tika-vin10t1:4884: Tato aññehi vā bhiyyo, ācikkhitvā yathātathaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4894: Aññatra paccayā tassa, dukkaṭaṁ tu pade pade.
tika-vin10t1:4899: Ārohā pana cattāro, dve dve taṁpādarakkhakā;
tika-vin10t1:4900: Evaṁ dvādasaposo ca, eko hatthīti vuccati.
tika-vin10t1:4903: Eko sārathi yodheko, āṇirakkhā duve janā.
tika-vin10t1:4906: Cattāro padahatthā ca, purisā pattīti vuccati.
tika-vin10t1:4914: Attano ca ṭhitokāsaṁ, sampattaṁ pana passati;
tika-vin10t1:4921: Ākāse iddhiyā seyyaṁ, pakappetu ca iddhimā;
tika-vin10t1:4931: Uyyodhikaṁ balaggaṁ vā, senābyūhampi vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:4937: Sesesupi ca eseva, nayo ñeyyo vibhāvinā;
tika-vin10t1:4942: Piṭṭhādīhi kataṁ majjaṁ, surā nāmāti vuccati;
tika-vin10t1:4943: Pupphādīhi kato sabbo, āsavo hoti merayaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4946: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:4978: Nimujjeyyapi vā bhikkhu, ummujjeyya tareyya vā.
tika-vin10t1:4980: Payoge ca payoge ca, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:4986: Yena yena panaṅgena, bhikkhuno tarato jalaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4989: Taruto tīrato vāpi, pācitti patato jale;
tika-vin10t1:4992: Pājentopi sace nāvaṁ, arittena phiyena vā;
tika-vin10t1:4993: Ussārentopi tīre vā, nāvaṁ kīḷati dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4995: Hatthena vāpi pādena, kaṭṭhena kathalāya vā;
tika-vin10t1:4998: Udakaṁ kañjikaṁ vāpi, cikkhallaṁ vāpi vikkhipaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5030: Disvā vā pana taṁ sutvā, mā vā bhāyatu, bhāyatu;
tika-vin10t1:5031: Itarassa tu bhikkhussa, hoti pācitti taṅkhaṇe.
tika-vin10t1:5040: Jotiṁ tappetukāmo ce, jalāpeyya jaleyya vā;
tika-vin10t1:5041: Ṭhapetvā hoti pācitti, tathārūpaṁ tu paccayaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5043: Sayaṁ samādahantassa, yāva jālā na jāyati;
tika-vin10t1:5053: Anāpatti gilānassa, kataṁ aññena vā pana.
tika-vin10t1:5059: Apuṇṇe addhamāsasmiṁ, dese ce majjhime pana;
tika-vin10t1:5066: Dukkaṭaṁ atirekaddha- māse ca samayesu ca.
tika-vin10t1:5075: Cīvaraṁ yaṁ nivāsetuṁ, sakkā pārupitumpi vā;
tika-vin10t1:5079: Yena kenaci kāḷena, kaddamenapi vā tathā.
tika-vin10t1:5084: Pāḷikaṇṇikakappo vā, na ca vaṭṭati katthaci;
tika-vin10t1:5085: Ekaṁ vāpi anekaṁ vā, bindu vaṭṭati vaṭṭakaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5090: Kappe naṭṭhepi vā saddhiṁ, tena saṁsibbitesu vā;
tika-vin10t1:5101: Kappatettāvatā kāmaṁ, nidhetuṁ, na ca kappati.
tika-vin10t1:5110: Yassa kassaci nāmaṁ tu, gahetvā sahadhamminaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5115: ‘‘Tissassa bhikkhuno vā tvaṁ, tassā tissāya theriyā;
tika-vin10t1:5122: Puna tenapi vattabbaṁ, ‘‘ko te mitto’’ti bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:5127: Tissāya theriyā vā tvaṁ, santakaṁ paribhuñja vā;
tika-vin10t1:5128: Vissajjehī’’ti vā vutte, hoti paccuddhaṭaṁ puna.
tika-vin10t1:5130: Iccetāsu pana dvīsu, yāya kāyaci cīvaraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5134: Yena taṁ vinayaṁ kammaṁ, kataṁ panidha bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:5186: Dhovato pana pattaṁ vā, nibbāpentassa yāguyo.
tika-vin10t1:5188: Hatthena taṁ uḷuṅkena, gahetvā nhāyatopi vā;
tika-vin10t1:5189: Payoge ca payoge ca, pācitti paridīpitā.
tika-vin10t1:5201: Siñcane siñcanaṁ vuttaṁ, paribhoge idaṁ pana.
tika-vin10t1:5203: Ayameva visesoti, tassa ceva panassa ca;
tika-vin10t1:5211: Vadatā pana taṁ kammaṁ, uccāletuṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:5213: Sace vippakate kamme, paṭikkosati taṁ puna;
tika-vin10t1:5219: ‘‘Adhammena ca vaggena, na ca kammārahassa vā;
tika-vin10t1:5220: Kata’’nti jānato natthi, doso ukkoṭane pana.
tika-vin10t1:5230: Āroceti sacaññassa, sopi aññassa vāti hi.
tika-vin10t1:5232: Evaṁ satampi bhikkhūnaṁ, sahassampi ca tāva taṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5233: Āpajjateva āpattiṁ, yāva koṭi na chijjati.
tika-vin10t1:5245: Na ca chādetukāmo vā, sabhāgaṁ vā na passati.
tika-vin10t1:5255: Tassa pācittiyaṁ hoti, sesānaṁ hoti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5263: Muñcitvā pana taṁ bhikkhuṁ, gaṇo ce paripūrati;
tika-vin10t1:5264: Honti te sūpasampannā, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:5266: Upajjhāyo sace hutvā, gaṇaṁ ācariyampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:5267: Pariyesati pattaṁ vā, sammannati ca māḷakaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5270: Ñattiyā ca tathā dvīsu, kammavācāsu dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5283: Maggaṁ gacchati saddhiṁ yo, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5285: Gamane saṁvidhāne ca, vattabbo yo vinicchayo;
tika-vin10t1:5286: So ca bhikkhunivaggasmiṁ, vuttattā na ca uddhaṭo.
tika-vin10t1:5305: Kammaṁ kileso pāko ca, upavādo atikkamo;
tika-vin10t1:5311: Tikkhattuṁ tehi vattabbo, ye passanti suṇanti ca;
tika-vin10t1:5312: ‘‘Mā hevaṁ avacāyasmā’’, iti bhikkhūhi so pana.
tika-vin10t1:5315: Ñattiyā ca tathā dvīhi, kammavācāhi dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5325: Saṁvaseyya ca bhuñjeyya, pācitti saha seyya vā.
tika-vin10t1:5327: Uposathādikaṁ kammaṁ, karoto saha tena hi;
tika-vin10t1:5331: Dadatopi tathā ekaṁ, bahūni ca bahūsvapi.
tika-vin10t1:5333: Ukkhittake nipannasmiṁ, itaro seti ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:5334: Itarasmiṁ nipanne vā, paro seti ubhopi vā.
tika-vin10t1:5343: Nissaṭṭhoti ca taṁ diṭṭhiṁ, saññissosāritoti ca.
tika-vin10t1:5349: Tathā vināsitaṁ jānaṁ, upalāpeyya tena vā;
tika-vin10t1:5359: Na hettha kiñci vattabbaṁ, sabbaṁ uttānamevidaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5363: Vuccamāno hi bhikkhūhi, bhikkhu sikkhāpadena yo;
tika-vin10t1:5393: Kāretabbo tathā bhikkhu, yathā dhammo ṭhito pana.
tika-vin10t1:5398: Evaṁ āropite mohe, yadi moheti yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:5399: Tasmiṁ mohanake vuttā, pācitti pana puggale.
tika-vin10t1:5411: Kuddho deti pahāraṁ ce, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:5414: Dinne bhijjatu sīsaṁ vā, pādo vā paribhijjatu;
tika-vin10t1:5415: So ce maratu vā, mā vā, pācitti paridīpitā.
tika-vin10t1:5418: Kaṇṇaṁ vā tassa nāsaṁ vā, yadi chindati dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5426: Pahāraṁ deti mokkhādhi-ppāyo doso na vijjati;
tika-vin10t1:5432: Iti vatvā panāyantaṁ, ‘‘gaccha re’’ti ca muggaraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5433: Satthaṁ vāpi gahetvā vā, paharitvā tu yāti ce.
tika-vin10t1:5435: Anāpatti sace tena, pahārena matepi ca;
tika-vin10t1:5442: Kāyaṁ vā kāyabaddhaṁ vā, uccāreyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:5445: Uggiritvā viraddho so, pahāraṁ deti ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:5448: Sace tena pahārena, pahaṭassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:5449: Hatthādīsupi yaṁ kiñci, aṅgaṁ bhijjati dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5468: Hoti vācāya vācāya, pācitti pana bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:5475: Vikāle ca tayā bhuttaṁ, mā eva’’nti ca bhāsato.
tika-vin10t1:5481: Sace bhaṇḍanajātānaṁ, bhikkhūnaṁ pana bhikkhu yo;
tika-vin10t1:5484: ‘‘Yaṁ ime tu bhaṇissanti, taṁ sossāmī’’ti gacchato;
tika-vin10t1:5503: Dhammikānaṁ tu kammānaṁ, chandaṁ datvā sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:5504: Pacchā khīyati pācitti, vācato vācato siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5510: Ime kammaṁ karontī’’ti, ñatvā khīyati tassa ca.
tika-vin10t1:5517: Ṭhapitā ñatti vā niṭṭhaṁ, kammavācā na gacchati.
tika-vin10t1:5519: Etasmiṁ antare kammaṁ, kopetuṁ parisāya hi;
tika-vin10t1:5522: Adatvā jahite chandaṁ, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:5523: Dhammakamme adhamme ca, vimatissa ca dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5528: Gilāno vā gilānassa, karaṇīye na dosatā;
tika-vin10t1:5535: Samaggena ca saṅghena, saddhiṁ datvāna cīvaraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5536: Sammatassa hi bhikkhussa, pacchā khīyati yo pana.
tika-vin10t1:5539: Tikapācittiyaṁ dhamma- kamme vuttaṁ tu cīvaraṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5562: Dukkaṭaṁ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā;
tika-vin10t1:5563: Deviyā vāpi rañño vā, sace na viditāgamo.
tika-vin10t1:5584: Sace kappiyavatthuṁ vā, vatthuṁ vāpi akappiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5591: ‘‘Na vaṭṭatī’’ti vatvā taṁ, na nidhetabbameva tu.
tika-vin10t1:5594: Palibodho hi nāmeso, ṭhapetuṁ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:5613: Dukkaṭaṁ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5615: Atha sambahulā gāmaṁ, vikāle pavisanti ce;
tika-vin10t1:5618: Gacchanti ce tato aññaṁ, tato aññanti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:5619: Puna āpucchane kiccaṁ, natthi gāmasatepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:5622: Pavisanti sace aññaṁ, pucchitabbaṁ tu antarā.
tika-vin10t1:5624: Katvā kulaghare bhatta- kiccaṁ aññattha vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:5625: Sace caritukāmo yo, sappibhikkhāya vā siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5627: Āpucchitvāva gantabbaṁ, passe ce bhikkhu labbhati;
tika-vin10t1:5628: Asante pana natthīti, gantabbaṁ tu yathāsukhaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5630: Otaritvā mahāvīthiṁ, bhikkhuṁ yadi ca passati;
tika-vin10t1:5636: Āpucchitvāva gantabbaṁ, passe ce bhikkhu vijjati;
tika-vin10t1:5656: Kārāpane ca karaṇe, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5661: Aññena ca kataṁ laddhā, dukkaṭaṁ paribhuñjato;
tika-vin10t1:5668: Navaṁ mañcampi pīṭhaṁ vā, kārāpentena bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:5675: Aññena ca kataṁ laddhā, dukkaṭaṁ paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t1:5681: Uttānaṁ vāpi aṭṭaṁ vā, bandhitvā paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t1:5684: Mañcaṁ vā pana pīṭhaṁ vā, tūlonaddhaṁ kareyya yo;
tika-vin10t1:5690: Aññena ca kataṁ laddhā, uddāletvā nisevato;
tika-vin10t1:5698: Dvīsu ṭhānesu phāletvā, tassa tisso dasā siyuṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5716: Cīvaraṁ bhikkhu kāreyya, karaṇe dukkaṭaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5721: Dīghaso ca pamāṇena, nava tassa vidatthiyo;
tika-vin10t1:5724: Aññena ca kataṁ laddhā, sevato dukkaṭaṁ bhave;
tika-vin10t1:5731: Yo cantaragharaṁ bhikkhu, paviṭṭhāya tu hatthato;
tika-vin10t1:5732: Aññātikāya yaṁ kiñci, tassa bhikkhuniyā pana.
tika-vin10t1:5740: Rathikāya sace ṭhatvā, deti bhikkhuni bhojanaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5741: Āpatti antarārāme, ṭhatvā gaṇhāti bhikkhu ce.
tika-vin10t1:5747: Vīthiyādīsu ce ṭhatvā, na doso paṭigaṇhato.
tika-vin10t1:5764: Gāmato nīharitvā vā, deti ce bahi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:5780: Anāpattittano bhattaṁ, padāpeti na deti ce;
tika-vin10t1:5781: Tathā aññassa bhattaṁ vā, na dāpeti padeti ce.
tika-vin10t1:5783: Yaṁ na dinnaṁ taṁ dāpeti, na dinnaṁ yattha vāpi ca;
tika-vin10t1:5784: Tattha tampi ca sabbesaṁ, samaṁ dāpeti bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t1:5800: Gahaṇe paribhoge ca, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5806: Nimantitassa vā bhikkhā, aññesaṁ tattha dīyati.
tika-vin10t1:5808: Gharato nīharitvā vā, denti ce yattha katthaci;
tika-vin10t1:5811: Anāgate hi bhikkhumhi, gharato paṭhamaṁ pana;
tika-vin10t1:5812: Nīharitvā sace dvāre, sampatte denti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:5814: Bhikkhuṁ pana ca disvāva, nīharitvāna gehato;
tika-vin10t1:5819: Ārāmaṁ upacāraṁ vā, pavisitvā sace pana.
tika-vin10t1:5825: Tassa vā parivārampi, aññaṁ katvā bahuṁ pana.
tika-vin10t1:5827: Yāguyā viditaṁ katvā, pūvaṁ bhattaṁ haranti ce;
tika-vin10t1:5831: Haranti tena saddhiṁ ce, sabbaṁ vaṭṭati tampi ca.
tika-vin10t1:5836: Yaṁ asaṁviditaṁ katvā, ābhataṁ pana taṁ bahi;
tika-vin10t1:5839: Gantvā vā antarāmagge, gahetabbaṁ tu bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:5864: Otāretvā nivatthabbaṁ, tato ūnaṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:5870: Ubho koṇe samaṁ katvā, sādaraṁ parimaṇḍalaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5874: Tasmā ghare vihāre vā, kattabbaṁ parimaṇḍalaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5877: Gaṇṭhikaṁ paṭimuñcitvā, katvā koṇe ubho samaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5880: Tathā akatvā bhikkhussa, jattūnipi urampi ca;
tika-vin10t1:5885: Hatthe piṇḍikamaṁsamhā, heṭṭhā pāde ubhopi ca.
tika-vin10t1:5888: Hoti so suppaṭicchanno, doso vāsūpagassa na.
tika-vin10t1:5891: Hatthaṁ vā pana pādaṁ vā, acālentena bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:5898: Yattha katthaci hi ṭṭhāne, ekasmiṁ antare ghare;
tika-vin10t1:5901: Yo anādariyaṁ katvā, olokento tahiṁ tahiṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5923: Gacchato dukkaṭaṁ hoti, tatheva ca nisīdato.
tika-vin10t1:5925: Kāyaṁ bāhuñca sīsañca, paggahetvā ujuṁ pana;
tika-vin10t1:5932: Khambhaṁ katvā sasīsaṁ vā, pārupitvāna gacchato;
tika-vin10t1:5933: Dukkaṭaṁ muninā vuttaṁ, tathā ukkuṭikāya vā.
tika-vin10t1:5938: Dutiye ca catutthe ca, chaṭṭhe vāsūpagassa tu;
tika-vin10t1:5956: Yaṁ kiñci pana bhikkhussa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5959: Sese thūpīkataṁ sabbaṁ, vaṭṭateva na saṁsayo.
tika-vin10t1:5961: Dvīsu pattesu bhattaṁ tu, gahetvā pattamekakaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5962: Pūretvā yadi peseti, bhikkhūnaṁ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:5965: Orohati sace heṭṭhā, na taṁ thūpīkataṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5968: Dinnaṁ ayāvakālittā, na taṁ thūpīkataṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5971: Piṇḍapātaṁ sace denti, idaṁ thūpīkataṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5973: Bhattassūpari paṇṇaṁ vā, thālakaṁ vāpi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t1:5976: Paṭiggahetumevassa, taṁ tu sabbaṁ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:5980: Paṭhamaṁ dutiyaṁ vutta-nayaṁ tu tatiye pana;
tika-vin10t1:5983: Aññesaṁ attano bhattaṁ, ākiraṁ pana bhājane;
tika-vin10t1:5987: Catutthe yaṁ tu vattabbaṁ, vuttaṁ pubbe asesato;
tika-vin10t1:5994: Yo bhiyyokamyatāhetu, sūpaṁ vā byañjanampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:5998: Viññattiyaṁ tu vattabbaṁ, apubbaṁ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t1:5999: Aṭṭhame pana ujjhāne, gilānopi na muccati.
tika-vin10t1:6021: Mukhe ca sakalaṁ hatthaṁ, pakkhipantassa dukkaṭaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:6022: Mukhe ca kabaḷaṁ katvā, kathetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:6024: Vacanaṁ yattakenassa, paripuṇṇaṁ na hoti hi;
tika-vin10t1:6028: Vacanaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ ce, kathetuṁ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:6032: Makkaṭo viya gaṇḍe vā, katvā bhuñjeyya dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:6043: Katvā evaṁ na bhottabbaṁ, saddaṁ ‘‘suru surū’’ti ca;
tika-vin10t1:6044: Hatthanillehakaṁ vāpi, na ca vaṭṭati bhuñjituṁ.
tika-vin10t1:6046: Phāṇitaṁ ghanayāguṁ vā, gahetvā aṅgulīhi taṁ;
tika-vin10t1:6053: Sāmisena tu hatthena, na ca pānīyathālakaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:6057: Santako pana saṅkho vā, sarāvaṁ vāpi thālakaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:6059: Tasmā na ca gahetabbaṁ, gaṇhato hoti dukkaṭaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:6067: Chattaṁ yaṁ kiñci hatthena, sarīrāvayavena vā;
tika-vin10t1:6076: Satthapāṇī na hotāsiṁ, sannayhitvā ṭhito pana.
tika-vin10t1:6079: Dhanuṁ sarena saddhiṁ vā, dhanuṁ vā sarameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:6083: Sace deseti saddhammaṁ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:6086: Na gaṇhāti naro tāva, dhammaṁ deseyya vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:6094: Sabbattha agilānassa, yāne vā sayanepi vā.
tika-vin10t1:6097: Pīṭhe mañcepi vā ucce, nisinnena ṭhitena vā.
tika-vin10t1:6099: Na ca vaṭṭati desetuṁ, ṭhatvā vā uccabhūmiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:6102: Samāne vāpi ucce vā, nipanne neva vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:6116: Aṭṭhame navame vāpi, dasame natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t1:6119: Pañhaṁ pucchati ce thero, kathetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:6124: Gacchato purato pañhaṁ, na vattabbaṁ tu pacchato;
tika-vin10t1:6127: Saddhiṁ uggahitaṁ dhammaṁ, sajjhāyati hi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:6135: Tatiye natthi vattabbaṁ, catutthe harite pana;
tika-vin10t1:6138: Jīvarukkhassa yaṁ mūlaṁ, dissamānaṁ tu gacchati;
tika-vin10t1:6139: Sākhā vā bhūmilaggā taṁ, sabbaṁ haritameva hi.
tika-vin10t1:6147: Kato aharite ṭhāne, haritaṁ eti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:6148: Siṅghāṇikā gatā ettha, kheḷeneva ca saṅgahaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:6154: Deve pana ca vassante, udakoghe samantato;
